original: ci ste ma yin zhe na zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i zhen pas so //
analyzed: ci ste ma yin zhe na zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i zhen pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBut if not, how can it be known?‚Äù‚Äîthat is, by such an attachment.

original: ji ltar mi 'dod ces bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'dod ces bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHow can it be known?‚Äù‚Äîthat is, by direct experience of its nature.

original: myong ba'i ngo bo ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni don gyi ste /
analyzed: myong ba'i ngo bo ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni don gyi ste /
translated: ‚ÄúEven if it is not the nature of experience,‚Äù that is, of the object,

original: gzhan myong ba'i phyir ram myong ba gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med pa na tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / rang nyid rig pa yin na don gyis go ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan myong ba'i phyir ram myong ba gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med pa na tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / rang nyid rig pa yin na don gyis go ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other experience, or because there is no apprehension of another experience, or because there is no valid cognition, or because if it were self-knowing, it would not be understood by the object.

original: ji ltar yin zhes bya ba ni rang la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar yin zhes bya ba ni rang la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHow can it be known?‚Äù‚Äîthat is, because it is contradictory for it to act on itself.

original: ma yin te mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa nyid bzhin du don lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid du 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa nyid bzhin du don lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid du 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNo, because it is seen‚Äù‚Äîthat is, because it is tenable that the object is not hidden, just as it is known.

original: de la yang gzhan la ltos pa yin @186a * //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan la ltos pa yin @186a * //
translated: ‚ÄúBut if it is dependent on another,‚Äù

original: na rtags med pa'i phyir rgyu rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: na rtags med pa'i phyir rgyu rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: then the cause is not known, because there is no evidence.

original: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas so //
translated: Also by others means by inference.

original: 'di la tshad ma ci yod ces bya ba ni de la gzung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la tshad ma ci yod ces bya ba ni de la gzung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the valid cognition here? means there is no object to be grasped there.

original: khyed la yang zhes bya ba ni nges pa yod pa la'o //
analyzed: khyed la yang zhes bya ba ni nges pa yod pa la'o //
translated: Also for you means when there is ascertainment.

original: nges pa med kyang phyi rol snang ba yin no zhes zer ba la gzhan rig pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa med kyang phyi rol snang ba yin no zhes zer ba la gzhan rig pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even without ascertainment, it is said the external appears, but it is not known by others.

original: bum pa zhes bya ba nas gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar du rgol ba yin no //
analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba nas gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar du rgol ba yin no //
translated: The argument is from a pot up to because it is established.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni mun pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni mun pa'o //
translated: There refers to darkness.

original: tshogs pa gcig la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgol ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa gcig la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgol ba'o //
translated: The argument from in the same assemblage and so on.

original: nges par grub pa yin na don dam par ni zhes bya ba ni lan yin te /
analyzed: nges par grub pa yin na don dam par ni zhes bya ba ni lan yin te /
translated: If it were definitely established, ultimately is the answer.

original: mngon sum nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang / nges pa yang de'i mthar thug pa nyid kyis rang dbang med pa'i phyir de lta bu'i nges pa las phyi rol grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang / nges pa yang de'i mthar thug pa nyid kyis rang dbang med pa'i phyir de lta bu'i nges pa las phyi rol grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not direct perception itself, and because ascertainment is not independent due to its finality, establishment external to such ascertainment is not possible.

original: nges pa tsam 'di ni rang rig pa yin la mar me'i gsal ba nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te dbang po dang bcas pa las rtogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir bum pa dang snang ba dang bcas pa nyid ni ma yin la mar me las ni
analyzed: nges pa tsam 'di ni rang rig pa yin la mar me'i gsal ba nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te dbang po dang bcas pa las rtogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir bum pa dang snang ba dang bcas pa nyid ni ma yin la mar me las ni
translated: This mere ascertainment is reflexive awareness, but the clarity of a butter lamp is not dependent on another, because the cognition arises from the sense faculty and not from the vase and light together.

original: yin gyi rang nyid las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de dag tsam ni dpe yin gyi rang nyid rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yin gyi rang nyid las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de dag tsam ni dpe yin gyi rang nyid rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The clarity of the butter lamp is from the butter lamp itself and not from itself, but that is merely the example, not reflexive awareness.

original: rnam pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'o //üîΩphyi rol nyid sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor dbang po la sogs pas rtogs pa ni rtogs pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no zhe na mar me'i snang ba kho na 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /üîΩgang gi phyir dngos po so so ba ni de la 'brel pa med pas te de nyid yod na 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'o // phyi rol nyid sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor dbang po la sogs pas rtogs pa ni rtogs pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no zhe na mar me'i snang ba kho na 'dzin par mi 'gyur te / gang gi phyir dngos po so so ba ni de la 'brel pa med pas te de nyid yod na 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The aspect is the aspect of the ma·πá·∏çala.üîΩIf the ma·πá·∏çala is realized by the sense organs, like external blue, it is the aspect of the realization itself.üîΩThe mere apprehension of the light of the butter lamp is not the apprehension of the butter lamp itself, because the individual entities are not related to it.

original: gzhan yang gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation that if it exists, it is not apprehended is ‚ÄúMoreover, if it is said that the light of the butter lamp is apprehended by the eye consciousness, it is not so.‚Äù

original: mar me las tha dad pa de'i gnas kho na 'dzin par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mar me las tha dad pa de'i gnas kho na 'dzin par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: It is shown that the place of that lamp is not apprehended as different from the lamp.

original: gal te de nyid ces bya ba ste de dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gal te de nyid ces bya ba ste de dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: If it were that, that is, the form of the circle,

original: gling bu rkyang pa la sogs pa la phyogs gcig 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni khyon dang ldan zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gling bu rkyang pa la sogs pa la phyogs gcig 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni khyon dang ldan zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is shown that it is not apprehended as one part of the flute, etc.

original: 'dzin pa ma yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ma yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is not apprehended.

original: de lta na zhes bya ba ni de la ltos pa 'dzin ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta na zhes bya ba ni de la ltos pa 'dzin ba yin no //
translated: In that case, it is apprehended in dependence on that.

original: mar me tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni mar me gang dang gang du mar me sbar ba de dang de na 'byung ba de'i phyir gnyi ga rgyu nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mar me tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni mar me gang dang gang du mar me sbar ba de dang de na 'byung ba de'i phyir gnyi ga rgyu nyid ma yin no //
translated: By the mere lamp, that is, wherever the lamp is lit, it arises there. Therefore, neither is the cause.

original: byed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The engagement of the agent is because it is made known.

original: dus mtshungs pa nyid kyis ni rtogs pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang ngo //
analyzed: dus mtshungs pa nyid kyis ni rtogs pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang ngo //
translated: By the simultaneity of time, it is the effect of the very knowledge.

original: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ni mig @186b dang de'i gzugs kyi yul lo //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ni mig @186b dang de'i gzugs kyi yul lo //
translated: The following, etc. are the eye and its object, form.

original: mar me ni dpe'o //
analyzed: mar me ni dpe'o //
translated: The lamp is the example.

original: de nyid ni dkyil 'khor nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni dkyil 'khor nyid do //
translated: That itself is the circle.

original: mig ni mig gi dbang po'o //
analyzed: mig ni mig gi dbang po'o //
translated: The eye is the eye faculty.

original: yongs su gsal ba ni sngon po la sogs pa rtogs pa'i ngo bo'am dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yongs su gsal ba ni sngon po la sogs pa rtogs pa'i ngo bo'am dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The illumination is the nature of the realization of blue, etc. or the nature of the circle.

original: dper na mar mes mar me gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'od kyis 'od gsal bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na mar mes mar me gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'od kyis 'od gsal bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Just as a lamp does not illuminate the lamp, in the same way, light does not illuminate light.

original: rang gsal ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gsal ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as it is self-illuminating, so is blue, etc. This is indicated by for that reason.

original: gnyis po ni mig dang gzugs dag go //
analyzed: gnyis po ni mig dang gzugs dag go //
translated: The two are the eye and form.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i ngo bos bskyed pa'i bag chags so //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i ngo bos bskyed pa'i bag chags so //
translated: Other refers to the latent tendencies produced by that kind of nature.

original: tshul gnyis ni rang rig pa dang sngon po'i ngo bo yin gyi rang rig pa las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshul gnyis ni rang rig pa dang sngon po'i ngo bo yin gyi rang rig pa las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The two modes are self-awareness and the nature of blue, not a circle other than self-awareness. This is the meaning.

original: yang na don nyid rang rig pa'i rnam pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yang na don nyid rang rig pa'i rnam pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Or, the object itself is not the aspect of self-awareness.

original: mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa'i rnam par ro //
analyzed: mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa'i rnam par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not tenable‚Äù means that it is not the aspect of self-awareness.

original: khyad par las ni tshogs pa'i khyad par las te /
analyzed: khyad par las ni tshogs pa'i khyad par las te /
translated: ‚ÄúDue to the difference in the object‚Äù means due to the difference in the collection.

original: thag ring po la bar du yod pa'i snang ba 'phros pas mang po yin pa'i phyir bkab pa mi gsal bar ni rigs te /
analyzed: thag ring po la bar du yod pa'i snang ba 'phros pas mang po yin pa'i phyir bkab pa mi gsal bar ni rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable that the obscured part is not clear because the light is spread out over a long distance and is many.

original: lha khang la sogs pa bzhin du cha 'ga' mi 'dzin pa'i phyir du ma'i bdag nyid don yin pas bsags pa'i phyogs kyis bri ba 'dzin pa la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: lha khang la sogs pa bzhin du cha 'ga' mi 'dzin pa'i phyir du ma'i bdag nyid don yin pas bsags pa'i phyogs kyis bri ba 'dzin pa la 'gal ba med do //
translated: It is not contradictory that the obscured part is apprehended by the side that is accumulated, because the object is the nature of many, like a temple, and so on, and because it does not apprehend a part.

original: chen po las chung du yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po las chung du yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the small exists in the large.

original: mya ngan du chung du la chen por 'dzin pa ni 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: mya ngan du chung du la chen por 'dzin pa ni 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: The apprehension of the small as large is mistaken.

original: rgyas pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni der 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rgyas pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni der 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The thought that it is because there is no expansion is ‚Äúit would be so.‚Äù

original: thag ring ba dang nye ba'i khyad par las snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir bkab pa'i cha ni mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: thag ring ba dang nye ba'i khyad par las snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir bkab pa'i cha ni mi 'dzin la /
translated: Because the appearance is different due to the difference of far and near, the obscured part is not apprehended.

original: cig shos ni 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig shos ni 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The other is apprehended. This is the meaning.

original: cha gcig bkab pa yin na de'i phyogs gzhan yang bkab pa yin la ma bkab na yang de'i cha dang ldan pa gzhan yang bkab par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: cha gcig bkab pa yin na de'i phyogs gzhan yang bkab pa yin la ma bkab na yang de'i cha dang ldan pa gzhan yang bkab par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one part is covered, the other parts are also covered. If one part is not covered, the other parts are not covered.

original: rdul phra rab nyid du khyad par med do zhes bstan pa ni de'i ste /üîΩsnang bas chod pa yin na ni cha 'ga' zhig mi mthong na cig shos kyang ngo //
analyzed: rdul phra rab nyid du khyad par med do zhes bstan pa ni de'i ste / snang bas chod pa yin na ni cha 'ga' zhig mi mthong na cig shos kyang ngo //
translated: There is no difference in subtlety.üîΩIf the object is obstructed by light, if one part is not seen, the other parts are not seen.

original: ma chod na yang gzhan mthong na gzhan yang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma chod na yang gzhan mthong na gzhan yang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the object is not obstructed by light, if one part is seen, the other parts are also seen.

original: mthong ba'i yul zhes bya ba ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i yul zhes bya ba ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'o //
translated: The object of seeing is an object that is suitable.

original: gzhan gyi ni thag ring po la ngo bo gzhan med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni thag ring po la ngo bo gzhan med pa'o //
translated: The other is distant, without a different nature.

original: shes pa ni de yod pa yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa ni de yod pa yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Consciousness is the existence of that, because it is different.

original: don la mi srid na shes pa la yin par bstan pa ni 'di ni mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don la mi srid na shes pa la yin par bstan pa ni 'di ni mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is impossible for an object, it is taught to be for consciousness. This is called seeing.

original: ma tshang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab rnams yongs su gyur @187a * //
analyzed: ma tshang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab rnams yongs su gyur @187a * //
translated: Without deficiency means that the atoms are transformed.

original: par mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: par mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is similar to the reflection.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni don gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni don gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of that is the nature of the object.

original: snang ba tha dad kyi snang du rung ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad kyi snang du rung ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not suitable to appear as a different appearance.

original: snang ba ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: snang ba ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The appearance is that of the object.

original: snang ba ni de las tha dad pa'i ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba ni de las tha dad pa'i ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a different appearance from that.

original: mtshan nyid ni de yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni de yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is its characteristic, because it has the characteristic of appearing.

original: de'i gnas skabs na mi snang ba dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs na mi snang ba dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: It does not possess non-appearance at that time,üîΩbecause it does not exist and because it does not appear at a distance.

original: med pa'i phyir dang thag ring por mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni don tha dad pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir dang thag ring por mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni don tha dad pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that it is a different object.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni spyi ni don gzhan du 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni spyi ni don gzhan du 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The other is the universal, because it is accepted as a different object.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni don gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni don gyi'o //
translated: That is of the object.

original: gsal ba nyid ni phyis de lta bu'i don byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba nyid ni phyis de lta bu'i don byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The manifestation is later, because it performs the function of that object.

original: de nyid ni zhes bya ba ni don nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni zhes bya ba ni don nyid yin na'o //
translated: That itself is the object.

original: de'i ni thag ring po na snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i ni thag ring po na snang ba'o //
translated: That is seen from a distance.

original: gzhan ni ring po ma yin pa na'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni ring po ma yin pa na'o //
translated: The other is not seen from a distance.

original: gnyi ga gcig yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga gcig yin te /
translated: Both are one,

original: gcig nyid du snang ba'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid du snang ba'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because they appear as one. This is indicated by the phrase ‚Äúin its nature.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin tha dad ni snang ba las so //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad ni snang ba las so //
translated: The difference in their natures is due to the appearance.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa yin te gcig nyid kyis gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa yin te gcig nyid kyis gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the cognition, because it is impaired by oneness.

original: rtogs pa nyid bag chags las tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can yin pa de'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni tha dad med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid bag chags las tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can yin pa de'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni tha dad med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition itself has an aspect that is not different from the latent impressions. Therefore, it is taught that it has an aspect.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni dus phyis so //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni dus phyis so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúagain later‚Äù means ‚Äúafterwards.‚Äù

original: gang las zhes bya ba ni cha yang nye ba bzhin du snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang las zhes bya ba ni cha yang nye ba bzhin du snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom which‚Äù means that the part does not appear as if it were near.

original: yan lag du ma can gyi rdzas la yan lag 'ga' zhig ring por snang ba gang yin pa ni rags pa yin la gzhan ni de lta ma yin pa de'i phyir gsal ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yan lag du ma can gyi rdzas la yan lag 'ga' zhig ring por snang ba gang yin pa ni rags pa yin la gzhan ni de lta ma yin pa de'i phyir gsal ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The substance that has many parts, in which some parts appear long, is gross, but the others do not appear so. Therefore, it is not clear.

original: snang ba mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni thag ring ba'i phyir ro //üîΩtha dad na zhes bya ba ni yan lag thams cad la khyab pa can thag ring ba'am /
analyzed: snang ba mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni thag ring ba'i phyir ro // tha dad na zhes bya ba ni yan lag thams cad la khyab pa can thag ring ba'am /
translated: If you think this, then it is not so, because the appearance is unclear.

original: gzhan du yang snang du rung ba'o //üîΩthams cad nyid ces bya ba ni yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa khyab pa can no //üîΩmthong bas zhes bya ba ni yan lag mi 'dzin na yang ngo//
analyzed: gzhan du yang snang du rung ba'o // thams cad nyid ces bya ba ni yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa khyab pa can no // mthong bas zhes bya ba ni yan lag mi 'dzin na yang ngo//

analyzed: mi snang ba'i yan lag la ltos nas yan lag can gyi ngo bo 'dzin pa mi gsal ba ma yin te thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni phyi rol don gcig ces bya ba ste /
translated: If it is different, then it is not so, because the appearance is distant.üîΩIf it is different, then it is not so,

original: nye ba na yang yan lag thams cad 'dzin pa ma yin na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nye ba na yang yan lag thams cad 'dzin pa ma yin na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it is near, it does not apprehend all of the parts.

original: du ma nyid yin na'am /
analyzed: du ma nyid yin na'am /
translated: If it is many,

original: rdul phra rab kyi dbye bas @187b gcig yin pa la gcig gi 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa ni gzhan la yang yin te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi dbye bas @187b gcig yin pa la gcig gi 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa ni gzhan la yang yin te /
translated: it is one because of the division of atoms. The apprehension of one and the non-apprehension of another is not so, because there is no difference.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni phra rdul du ma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni phra rdul du ma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúmany atoms.‚Äù

original: gzhan du nad dang bcas par 'dzin pa na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du nad dang bcas par 'dzin pa na'o //
translated: In another case, it apprehends the whole as defective.

original: gzhan du 'gyur ba ni yongs su gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan du 'gyur ba ni yongs su gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid do //
translated: In another case, it is transformed into the form of the whole.üîΩIs the non-apprehension of the very subtle parts not the cause of the non-manifestation of the apprehension of the whole?

original: ches srab pa'i yan lag mi 'dzin pa nyid yan lag can 'dzin pa la ni mi gsal ba nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gzhan zhes bya ba ni yan lag nyid seng ldeng dang pa la shal sogs pa la ni ma yin te
analyzed: ches srab pa'i yan lag mi 'dzin pa nyid yan lag can 'dzin pa la ni mi gsal ba nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gzhan zhes bya ba ni yan lag nyid seng ldeng dang pa la shal sogs pa la ni ma yin te
translated: In another case, it is the parts themselves, not the k·π£ƒ´rikƒÅ, palƒÅ≈õa, etc.,

original: / yan lag can de lta bu'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / yan lag can de lta bu'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the whole has that nature.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na sna tshogs pa gcig tu gyur la /üîΩthag ring ba la de tha dad par snang ba ji ltar de tsam ni mi gsal ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na sna tshogs pa gcig tu gyur la / thag ring ba la de tha dad par snang ba ji ltar de tsam ni mi gsal ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: If it were not such an entity, the various would become one.üîΩAnd it is not the case that what appears as different in the distance is just unclear, because the realization of the nature is the realization of the unclear.

original: rang bzhin rtogs pa nyid mi gsal ba rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don ni gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin rtogs pa nyid mi gsal ba rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don ni gsal ba yin te /
translated: The meaning is clear.

original: thal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba dang mtshams sbyor ro //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba dang mtshams sbyor ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúthen‚Äù connects to the next verse.

original: du ma nyid yin na zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab bsags pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir phyi rol lo //
analyzed: du ma nyid yin na zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab bsags pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir phyi rol lo //
translated: If it were manifold, it would be external, because it would have the nature of an aggregation of subtle particles.

original: de mi 'dzin na ni rdul phra rab gcig mi 'dzin na'o //
analyzed: de mi 'dzin na ni rdul phra rab gcig mi 'dzin na'o //
translated: If it did not apprehend that, it would not apprehend a single subtle particle.

original: de las gzhan pa ni rdul phra rab gzhan te de dang lhan cig 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni rdul phra rab gzhan te de dang lhan cig 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOther than that‚Äù means another subtle particle, because it would apprehend that together with the other.

original: rdul phra rab gcig mi 'dzin na gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin te bsdus pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul phra rab gcig mi 'dzin na gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin te bsdus pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it did not apprehend a single subtle particle, it would not apprehend the other, because it would apprehend the composite.

original: yongs su gsal ba ni ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yongs su gsal ba ni ngo bo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúClearly‚Äù means ‚Äúin essence.‚Äù

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni yongs su gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni yongs su gsal ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the manifestation.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'dzin pa las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'dzin pa las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù refers to the apprehension of something else.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the manifestation.

original: de lta bur gyur pa ni de las gzhan pa 'dzin pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa ni de las gzhan pa 'dzin pa las byung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch‚Äù refers to the apprehension of something other than that.

original: gzhan gyis rkyang ni nye ba na yod pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rkyang ni nye ba na yod pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe other‚Äù refers to the object that is near.

original: rtogs pa nyid ni shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid ni shes pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThe cognition‚Äù is the knowledge.

original: don 'bar bzhin par mthong ba zhes bya ba ni bzung ba'o //üîΩ'bras bu 'bar bzhin pa nyid yin pas mig la de ltar brjod pa yin gyis rang nyid las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don 'bar bzhin par mthong ba zhes bya ba ni bzung ba'o // 'bras bu 'bar bzhin pa nyid yin pas mig la de ltar brjod pa yin gyis rang nyid las ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe object is seen as if it were burning‚Äù means that it is grasped.

original: mngon sum las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The eye is said to be ‚Äúas if it were burning‚Äù because of the result, but not by itself, because it is known through direct perception.

original: de ldan zhes bya ba ni 'bar bzhin pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de ldan zhes bya ba ni 'bar bzhin pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with that‚Äù means endowed with the burning.

original: de'i 'bras bu mthong ba ni mig gi'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu mthong ba ni mig gi'o //
translated: The result of that is seen by the eye.

original: 'on kyang yul nyid kyis rang gi chos yul can la sgro 'dogs pa yin no zhes zer ba ni der 'gyur na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang yul nyid kyis rang gi chos yul can la sgro 'dogs pa yin no zhes zer ba ni der 'gyur na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: However, it is said that the object itself superimposes its own property on the subject.

original: lan ni sngon po la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni sngon po la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúEven in the blue, etc.‚Äù

original: shes pa la yod pa nyid ni mi gsal ba nyid yin gyi don la gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa la yod pa nyid ni mi gsal ba nyid yin gyi don la gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The existence in consciousness is not the clarity, but the non-existence in the object is taught. Therefore, he says: ‚ÄúFor that reason, etc.‚Äù

original: 'jig rten thams cad @188a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad @188a * //
translated: ‚ÄúAll the world‚Äù

original: ces bya ba ni nga'i mig ni 'bar bzhin zhes rgyu med bzhin pa'i gnod pa med pas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni nga'i mig ni 'bar bzhin zhes rgyu med bzhin pa'i gnod pa med pas so //
translated: means that the world is not harmed by the absence of a cause, as in the statement: ‚ÄúMy eye is burning.‚Äù

original: rang nyid bdag nyid du'o //üîΩgsal ba dang cig shos kyang rung phyi rol ma yin na ma de ltar zhen pa'i phyir la shes pa'i rnam pa yang de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol nyid du 'jog par byed yin gyi don gyi gnod pa med na 'khrul pa'am /
analyzed: rang nyid bdag nyid du'o // gsal ba dang cig shos kyang rung phyi rol ma yin na ma de ltar zhen pa'i phyir la shes pa'i rnam pa yang de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol nyid du 'jog par byed yin gyi don gyi gnod pa med na 'khrul pa'am /
translated: ‚ÄúBy itself‚Äù means by its own nature.üîΩIf the clarity and the other are not external, then the form of consciousness is posited as external because of the adherence to that.

original: mthong ba med na gsal nyid la sogs pa la rgyu mtshan 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te brtags bzhin pa na snang ba mi gsal ba dang cig shos la sogs pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba med na gsal nyid la sogs pa la rgyu mtshan 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te brtags bzhin pa na snang ba mi gsal ba dang cig shos la sogs pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If there were no harm to the object, there would be no error, and if there were no seeing, there would be no reason for the clarity, etc. But when the appearance is examined, the non-clarity and the other are seen.

original: de la ni de de lta bu'i snang ba yin gyi de ltar snang ba yang shes pa'i chos ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ni de de lta bu'i snang ba yin gyi de ltar snang ba yang shes pa'i chos ma yin te /
translated: In that case, that is the appearance of that, but the appearance as such is not a phenomenon of consciousness,üîΩbecause it appears as if it abides in the object of consciousness.

original: shes bya la gnas pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni gal te snang ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: shes bya la gnas pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni gal te snang ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is said that what is called appearance

original: mi gsal ba ni snang ba la yod pa'o //
analyzed: mi gsal ba ni snang ba la yod pa'o //
translated: is unclear, it exists in appearance.

original: mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i don ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i don ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is the meaning of unclear and so on?

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it clarifies that.

original: de lta na des byas pa yin pa de'i phyir der de'i ngo bo nye ba na 'dug pa yang shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na des byas pa yin pa de'i phyir der de'i ngo bo nye ba na 'dug pa yang shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, because it is produced by that, therefore, when its nature is nearby, it also becomes consciousness.

original: 'on te de'i blo de ltar byed pa yin na de lta na de las 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid 'di ma yin par bstan pa ni gzhan tha dad pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te de'i blo de ltar byed pa yin na de lta na de las 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid 'di ma yin par bstan pa ni gzhan tha dad pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if the mind is like that, then it is not like that which comes from that, and the possession of aspects is taught.

original: snang ba'i ngo bo mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa blo tha dad pa ste shes pa 'dzin pa'i byed pa tha dad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: snang ba'i ngo bo mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa blo tha dad pa ste shes pa 'dzin pa'i byed pa tha dad pa yin gyi /
translated: The different minds, that is, consciousnesses, that apprehend the unclear nature of appearance and so on have different functions.

original: rang las ni ma yin te rang la gnas pa'i dbye ba ni rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: rang las ni ma yin te rang la gnas pa'i dbye ba ni rnam pa yin no //
translated: Not from itself, because the division that resides in itself is the form.

original: re zhig mi gsal bas gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig mi gsal bas gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: First, it does not clarify what is not clear,

original: nye ba na gnas pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye ba na gnas pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because what is nearby is not perceived.

original: des byas pa'i gsal ba mi gsal ba yin zhes bya ba ni blo nyid kyi de lta bu'i rnam pa nyid dam de'i byed pa'i yang ngo //
analyzed: des byas pa'i gsal ba mi gsal ba yin zhes bya ba ni blo nyid kyi de lta bu'i rnam pa nyid dam de'i byed pa'i yang ngo //
translated: The clarity produced by it is not clear means that the cognition itself has that kind of form, or it is produced by that.

original: blo dang don dag 'brel pa can ma yin pa'i snang ba'i chos 'ga' yang med par bstan pa ni don ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo dang don dag 'brel pa can ma yin pa'i snang ba'i chos 'ga' yang med par bstan pa ni don ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement There is no dharma that appears without a connection between cognition and object is about the object.

original: med pa nyid snang ba ni ma yin te 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa nyid snang ba ni ma yin te 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not an appearance of non-existence, because that is contradictory.

original: med pa'i ngo bo snang ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i ngo bo snang ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not an appearance of the nature of non-existence,

original: thag ring ba dang cig shos na gnas pa thams cad mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thag ring ba dang cig shos na gnas pa thams cad mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because everything that is distant or otherwise would be directly perceived.

original: skar khung gi bu ga'i nyi zer las yod par go ba'i rdul rnams nam mkha' khyab par byed pa de dag gis thag ring po nas bsgribs pa'i rdzas lha khang la sogs pa chen po yin yang ches mang ba rnams kyis bsgribs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: skar khung gi bu ga'i nyi zer las yod par go ba'i rdul rnams nam mkha' khyab par byed pa de dag gis thag ring po nas bsgribs pa'i rdzas lha khang la sogs pa chen po yin yang ches mang ba rnams kyis bsgribs pa yin gyi /
translated: and the light rays from the window opening pervade the sky.üîΩThe many particles that obscure distant objects, even large ones such as a temple, are similar to the many light rays that obscure distant objects.

original: snang ba chen po yin yang gsal bar mi nus pa la mi gsal ba yin no snyam du sems pa la nye ba yin rdul @188b rnams kyis g-yogs pa dang snang ba mi gsal bar byed pa yang mtshungs pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba chen po yin yang gsal bar mi nus pa la mi gsal ba yin no snyam du sems pa la nye ba yin rdul @188b rnams kyis g-yogs pa dang snang ba mi gsal bar byed pa yang mtshungs pa yin te /
translated: The particles that obscure and the light rays that obscure are similar.

original: rdul phra rab kyis srab pa nyid ni snang ba de'i phra ba nyid la gnod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyis srab pa nyid ni snang ba de'i phra ba nyid la gnod par byed pa yin te /
translated: The subtle nature of the particles obstructs the subtlety of the light.

original: snang ba ni mang ba nyid bzhin du cig shos mang ba nyid kyang yin par bstan pa ni snang ba de yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: snang ba ni mang ba nyid bzhin du cig shos mang ba nyid kyang yin par bstan pa ni snang ba de yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The statement the light is also many indicates that the light is many, just as the particles are many.

original: thag ring po na yod pa'i rdul rnams kyis bsgribs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: thag ring po na yod pa'i rdul rnams kyis bsgribs pa yin gyi /
translated: The light is obscured by the particles that exist at a distance.

original: ci ste ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci ste ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If not, then the meaning is that it is not.

original: ci las she na nye ba la yang de ste bsgribs pa cis ma yin zhes bya ba ni g-yogs pa dang bsgribs pa dag thag ring ba bzhin du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci las she na nye ba la yang de ste bsgribs pa cis ma yin zhes bya ba ni g-yogs pa dang bsgribs pa dag thag ring ba bzhin du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why not? Because it is near. Why is it not obscured? Because there is no difference between the obscured and the distant.

original: dmigs par bya ba sgrib par byed pa ni thag ring ba la yin gyi nye ba la ma yin pa yin nam /
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba sgrib par byed pa ni thag ring ba la yin gyi nye ba la ma yin pa yin nam /
translated: Is the object of apprehension obscured when it is distant, but not when it is near?

original: thag ring par yang snang du rung ba nye ba la ches shin tu ba la yin nam /
analyzed: thag ring par yang snang du rung ba nye ba la ches shin tu ba la yin nam /
translated: If it is suitable to appear even when distant, then it is suitable to appear when near.

original: gzhan du rigs sam yan lag can yang de'i gnas skabs dang ldan pa de'i tshogs pa las dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang ci'i phyir lan ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du rigs sam yan lag can yang de'i gnas skabs dang ldan pa de'i tshogs pa las dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang ci'i phyir lan ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or, if the class or the whole possesses that state, then the apprehension is from the collection of that. Why is this not an answer?

original: sgrib par byed pa srab pa'i phyir nye ba la mi srab po zhe na /
analyzed: sgrib par byed pa srab pa'i phyir nye ba la mi srab po zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not obscured when near because the obscuring is slight,

original: lan ni snang ba yang zhes bya ba ste nye ba la yang 'di srab ba nyid do //
analyzed: lan ni snang ba yang zhes bya ba ste nye ba la yang 'di srab ba nyid do //
translated: the answer is that the appearance is also slight when near.

original: thag ring ba la yang gnyi ga mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir sgrib par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni gzhan du'ang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: thag ring ba la yang gnyi ga mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir sgrib par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni gzhan du'ang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because the same applies to distant objects, it is said, ‚ÄúAlso in other places.‚Äù

original: thag ring ba la yang srab par byed pa dang cig shos dag srab par ma yin par mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: thag ring ba la yang srab par byed pa dang cig shos dag srab par ma yin par mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: The same applies to distant objects: the thinness of the air and the other do not differ.

original: shin tu nye ba der yang ni nye ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: shin tu nye ba der yang ni nye ba la yang ngo //
translated: Also in the case of very close objects,

original: nam mkha' can gyis khyab pas ni rlung gis so //
analyzed: nam mkha' can gyis khyab pas ni rlung gis so //
translated: the sky-possessor pervades, i.e., the wind.

original: 'di na zhes bya ba ni nye ba pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di na zhes bya ba ni nye ba pa la'o //
translated: Here means in the case of close objects.

original: srog chags go dha'i mjug ma dang / ri bong gi rna ba ring ba nyid mtshungs pa yin la /
analyzed: srog chags go dha'i mjug ma dang / ri bong gi rna ba ring ba nyid mtshungs pa yin la /
translated: The long tail of the Godha insect and the long ears of the rabbit are similar.

original: thag ring ba la rdul mang ba nyid yin na snang ba la yang yin te /
analyzed: thag ring ba la rdul mang ba nyid yin na snang ba la yang yin te /
translated: In the case of distant objects, there is a greater number of particles, but there is also light.

original: de yang der de lta bu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang der de lta bu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is just so in that case.

original: nye ba la srab pa nyid kyi phyir rdul sgrib par byed pa ma yin na shin tu nye ba la ches shin tu yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni shin tu nye ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba la srab pa nyid kyi phyir rdul sgrib par byed pa ma yin na shin tu nye ba la ches shin tu yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni shin tu nye ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since the near is more subtle, the atom does not obscure it. Since the very near is much more subtle, it is said, ‚Äúthe very near.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni des gsal bar byas pa ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni des gsal bar byas pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to what is illuminated by it.

original: thams cad du mi gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pas kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur te dbang pos mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad du mi gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pas kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur te dbang pos mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since it has the nature of not being illuminated everywhere, it is not seen, because the sense faculty is not capable of that, is the meaning.

original: thag ring por khyad par mthong ba las dngos po mi snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thag ring por khyad par mthong ba las dngos po mi snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since it is not seen at a distance, the thing is not seen, is what is meant.

original: thag ring po na'am shin tu nye ba la ni ma mthong ba'i dbang gis mi gsal ba'i ngo bo gzhan de'i tshe nyid na byung ba ni gsal ba mthong bar byed pa ni snang ba la sgrib par byed pa ma @189a * //
analyzed: thag ring po na'am shin tu nye ba la ni ma mthong ba'i dbang gis mi gsal ba'i ngo bo gzhan de'i tshe nyid na byung ba ni gsal ba mthong bar byed pa ni snang ba la sgrib par byed pa ma @189a * //
translated: Since it is not seen at a distance or very near, the unilluminated nature that arises at that time is not seen. The illumination that causes the appearance of the object is obscured by the atom.

original: yin la / nye ba la ni de nyid snang ba gsal bas bsgribs pa yin par 'dod ba gang dag gi yin de dag gi thag ring po na snang ba nyams pas bsgribs pa ni gsal bar mthong bar byed ba ma yin zhing nye ba la yang mi gsal ba yin
analyzed: yin la / nye ba la ni de nyid snang ba gsal bas bsgribs pa yin par 'dod ba gang dag gi yin de dag gi thag ring po na snang ba nyams pas bsgribs pa ni gsal bar mthong bar byed ba ma yin zhing nye ba la yang mi gsal ba yin
translated: But it is obscured to the one nearby, because of the clarity of the appearance of that very thing.

original: par bstan pa ni gal te der yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: par bstan pa ni gal te der yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To show that it is not seen clearly when obscured by the diminution of the appearance of that thing at a distance, and that it is not clear even when nearby, he says, ‚ÄúIf it is obscured there also, it is not seen clearly.‚Äù

original: de bshad pa ni ma mthong ba'i ming can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni ma mthong ba'i ming can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that is, ‚ÄúIt is called ‚Äòunseen.‚Äô ‚Äù

original: sems pa med pa zhes bya bas rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'am mi mthun pa nyid la skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: sems pa med pa zhes bya bas rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'am mi mthun pa nyid la skyon med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not sentient‚Äù shows its nature, or the absence of a fault in the contradiction.

original: de la gcig nyid ni thag ring ba dang cig shos dag la mi sgrib pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: de la gcig nyid ni thag ring ba dang cig shos dag la mi sgrib pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe one is not obscured to the other at a distance‚Äù is the opinion of others.

original: mthong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i lan bshad pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i lan bshad pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the answer, ‚ÄúIt is seen,‚Äù is, ‚ÄúIf that is so.‚Äù

original: gzhan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not otherwise‚Äù is the clarification.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mthong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mthong bar byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the one that is seen clearly.

original: de zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba las skye ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba las skye ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the arising of what is not seen.

original: rgyab tu ni gsal bar mthong ba'i phyi nas so //
analyzed: rgyab tu ni gsal bar mthong ba'i phyi nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBehind‚Äù means that it is seen clearly in front.

original: ma yin te yul gcig nyid ces bya ba ni ma mthong ba las byung ba ste /
analyzed: ma yin te yul gcig nyid ces bya ba ni ma mthong ba las byung ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNo, because of the single object‚Äù means that it arises from what is not seen.

original: gsal pe dang yul mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: gsal pe dang yul mtshungs pa'o //
translated: It is clear and has a similar object.

original: 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yul nye bar 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan thun mong ma yin pa nyid mthong ba las mngon par 'dod do //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yul nye bar 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan thun mong ma yin pa nyid mthong ba las mngon par 'dod do //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is an error‚Äù means that it is accepted as the non-common cause of the apprehension of the object, because of seeing the non-common reason.

original: yul la 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mthong ba po'i ste rgyab kyi phyogs nyid kyang gsal ba'i phyogs nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul la 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mthong ba po'i ste rgyab kyi phyogs nyid kyang gsal ba'i phyogs nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe error of the object‚Äù means that the one who sees clearly also sees the rear part as the clear part.

original: de ltar na de'i tshe med pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba yul der yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na de'i tshe med pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba yul der yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, at that time, it is said that it does not exist.

original: de'i dus na med la dus gzhan gyi tshe yod par dmigs na thal ches par bstan pa ni de'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dus na med la dus gzhan gyi tshe yod par dmigs na thal ches par bstan pa ni de'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is observed that it exists at another time, it is shown to be absurd: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: de'i dus na thams cad med bar mthong ba yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i dus na thams cad med bar mthong ba yin zhing /
translated: At that time, everything is seen as non-existent.

original: don thams cad mthong ba nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: don thams cad mthong ba nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it the case that all objects are seen.

original: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bas kyang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bas kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúBy others‚Äù means by the Buddhas.

original: ma mthong ba de las zhes bya ba ni bag chags las so //
analyzed: ma mthong ba de las zhes bya ba ni bag chags las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that non-seeing‚Äù means from the residual impressions.

original: mthong ba ni shes pa de'i skye ba ste gzhung 'dzugs na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mthong ba ni shes pa de'i skye ba ste gzhung 'dzugs na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúSeeing‚Äù means the arising of that cognition.

original: rmi lam bzhin du yod pa zhes bya ba ni gzhung 'dzugs pa yin la /
analyzed: rmi lam bzhin du yod pa zhes bya ba ni gzhung 'dzugs pa yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúAs in a dream‚Äù is the thesis.

original: med pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni sun 'don pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni sun 'don pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-existence‚Äù is the refutation.

original: dngos gang ji ltar mthong gyur pa //
analyzed: dngos gang ji ltar mthong gyur pa //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever object is seen‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i yul can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i yul can no //
translated: refers to the object of the cognition of the manifest.

original: rgyab tu gsal bar mthong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni mi gsal zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyab tu gsal bar mthong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni mi gsal zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot clearly‚Äù shows that it is not seen in the back.

original: mdun na gnas pa ni gsal bar mthong ba po'i yang ngo //
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa ni gsal bar mthong ba po'i yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThe one who sees clearly the object in front‚ÄùüîΩrefers to the manifest.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the manifest.

original: ma mthong ba de las skyes pa po gang gi sgrib byed yin pa de nyid de mthong @189b ba yin pas gzhan ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la de la gcig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma mthong ba de las skyes pa po gang gi sgrib byed yin pa de nyid de mthong @189b ba yin pas gzhan ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la de la gcig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The one who is obscured by that which is produced from the non-seeing is that very one who sees, not another.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni thag ring po na gnas pa'i gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni thag ring po na gnas pa'i gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù is a manifest entity that is located far away.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni lan gang pa'i ched du rjes su brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni lan gang pa'i ched du rjes su brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is a conditional statement.

original: ma mthong ba 'dis bsgribs pa'i phyir bsgribs ba yin na mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs kho na'i tshig gi lhag ma yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma mthong ba 'dis bsgribs pa'i phyir bsgribs ba yin na mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs kho na'i tshig gi lhag ma yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is obscured because it is obscured by this non-seeing, it will not be seen‚Äù is a statement that is incomplete without the context.

original: ci byed ces bya ba ni go byed ba'o //
analyzed: ci byed ces bya ba ni go byed ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat does it do?‚Äù means ‚ÄúWhat is its function?‚Äù

original: 'bras bu med par rang nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu med par rang nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist without a result.

original: thag ring por ma mthong ba gsal ba gang yin pa 'brel pa can de'i mi gsal bar mthong pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: thag ring por ma mthong ba gsal ba gang yin pa 'brel pa can de'i mi gsal bar mthong pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The manifest entity that is not seen from a distance is related to the manifest entity that is seen indistinctly.

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms kyi rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms kyi rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This also is to be known as equanimity.

original: sun 'byin pa dang gzhung 'dzugs pa'am sun 'byin pa de'i yang ngo //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa dang gzhung 'dzugs pa'am sun 'byin pa de'i yang ngo //
translated: It is the refutation and the establishment of the text, or the refutation of that.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni thag ring por mi gsal ba shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir myong ba ni thams cad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni thag ring por mi gsal ba shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir myong ba ni thams cad do //
translated: Therefore, all experience is in the form of the cognition of what is distant and unclear.

original: rgyu bzhin du ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu las ma 'das pa'o //üîΩdon la brten pa ni dbang po la sogs pa las ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu bzhin du ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu las ma 'das pa'o // don la brten pa ni dbang po la sogs pa las ma yin te /
translated: Like the cause, it is not beyond the cause of the similar and immediately antecedent condition and the sense faculties, etc.

original: de yod kyang shes pa gzhan la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod kyang shes pa gzhan la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not based on the sense faculties, etc., because even when they exist, the cognition of another does not exist.

original: lhag ma ni rnam pa med pa dang tha mi dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rnam pa med pa dang tha mi dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The rest is the form of the sense faculties, etc., which are without form and undifferentiated.

original: blo ngan rnams ni lugs ngan zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med pa nyid yin na dbang po la sogs pa mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa la sogs pa rjes su byed pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩskad cig par mngon par 'dod pa ni don gyi shes pa yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: blo ngan rnams ni lugs ngan zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med pa nyid yin na dbang po la sogs pa mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa la sogs pa rjes su byed pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro // skad cig par mngon par 'dod pa ni don gyi shes pa yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: The bad theory of those with bad minds is called the ‚Äúbad system.‚Äù If there were no aspects, then the senses, etc., would not be clear, and it would follow, absurdly, that they would not be affected by such things as mixing.

original: don rgyu yin pa nyid kyi de'i dus ma yin pa na med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni shes pa sgra dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don rgyu yin pa nyid kyi de'i dus ma yin pa na med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni shes pa sgra dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of an object is also with aspects, because the object is the cause, and it does not exist at other times. This is demonstrated by the phrase ‚Äúthe cognition of sound.‚Äù

original: cig shos kyi ni rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cig shos kyi ni rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The other is inference, etc.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med na'o //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy what‚Äù means ‚Äúif there are no aspects.‚Äù

original: med pa ni zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: med pa ni zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos mi gnas pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNonexistent‚Äù means not abiding by its own nature.

original: gzhan gyi ngo bos kyang mthong na gzhan gyi rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bos kyang mthong na gzhan gyi rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid yin te /
translated: If it were seen by another nature, then it would have another‚Äôs aspects.

original: rang rig pa la ni de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir yang gsal ba yin no zhes bya bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang rig pa la ni de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir yang gsal ba yin no zhes bya bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is clear in self-awareness because of its identity with it.üîΩIt is not just the object that is helpful, because all would attain that very thing.

original: dmigs pa nyid kho na phan 'dogs pa ma yin te thams cad de lta bu nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gsal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid kho na phan 'dogs pa ma yin te thams cad de lta bu nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gsal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit would be clear‚Äù is that it is not just the object that is helpful, because all would attain that very thing.

original: dmigs pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs pa nyid du rtogs pa ni dus gzhan @190a * //üîΩkho na ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs pa nyid du rtogs pa ni dus gzhan @190a * // kho na ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid yin no //
translated: The understanding of the helpfulness of the object is that it has aspects, because it is not just at another time.

original: rjes su dpag pa yang shes pa'i rgyu nges par byung ba gzung ba yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin pa ma yin snyam du sems pa ni gal rgyu zhes bya ba ste snga ma nyid kyi tshogs pa ni /üîΩyul gyi skad cig shes dang bcas //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang shes pa'i rgyu nges par byung ba gzung ba yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin pa ma yin snyam du sems pa ni gal rgyu zhes bya ba ste snga ma nyid kyi tshogs pa ni / yul gyi skad cig shes dang bcas //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit is not the case that all are not the cause of the arising of the cognition‚Äù is that the collection of the previous object and the sense faculty is the cause of the arising of the cognition.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúthe object-moment together with the cognition‚Äù is that the object-moment together with the cognition is the cause of the arising of the cognition.

original: snang ba dang bcas gzugs bzhin byed //üîΩde phyir lhan cig rig pa yin //
analyzed: snang ba dang bcas gzugs bzhin byed // de phyir lhan cig rig pa yin //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit appears as form‚Äù is that the object-moment together with the cognition appears as form.

original: zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äútherefore it is cognized together‚Äù is that the object-moment together with the cognition is cognized together.

original: so sor nges pa'i rang gi tshogs pa las byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nges par rtog pa ni skye ba la shes pa ste rig pa'i byed pa la med do //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i rang gi tshogs pa las byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nges par rtog pa ni skye ba la shes pa ste rig pa'i byed pa la med do //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúarising from its own collection of causes‚Äù means that the cognition of an object arises from its own collection of causes.

original: rang la yod pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byed pa yin gyi skye bas ni ma yin te 'brel ba'i nye ba dang gzhan la yang khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di lhan cig skyes pa ni byed pa la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang la yod pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byed pa yin gyi skye bas ni ma yin te 'brel ba'i nye ba dang gzhan la yang khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di lhan cig skyes pa ni byed pa la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The cognition is distinguished by its own particularities, not by arising, because arising is related to the near and the distant, and it is not a particularity of another, and because it is a harm to the self.

original: de lta na rnam pa de nyid shes pa'i rang bzhin yin par ston gyi so sor nges pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na rnam pa de nyid shes pa'i rang bzhin yin par ston gyi so sor nges pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not the case that the cognition of an object is distinguished by arising.

original: rgyu las zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa bzhin du don las kyang shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu las zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa bzhin du don las kyang shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom its cause‚Äù means that the cognition arises from its own cause, just as it is understood.

original: de'i phyir rtogs pa nyid las gzung ba la sogs pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtogs pa nyid las gzung ba la sogs pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the cognition is not distinguished by the object, etc.

original: gzhan du na don dang shes pa yang rgyu las skyes pa don bzhin du khyad par du snang ba ni rang nyid rig pa la byed pa dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te rgyu nyid las nges pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni 'on
analyzed: gzhan du na don dang shes pa yang rgyu las skyes pa don bzhin du khyad par du snang ba ni rang nyid rig pa la byed pa dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te rgyu nyid las nges pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni 'on
translated: Otherwise, the object and consciousness are born from a cause, and like the object, the special appearance is due to reflexive awareness, but not due to anything else, because it is ascertained from the cause itself.

original: te rgyu dang 'bras bur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: te rgyu dang 'bras bur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the so-called cause and effect.üîΩJust as the effect is born from its cause, form and so on are not born from consciousness.

original: rang gi rgyu las gzhan skye ba bzhin du shes pa las kyang gzugs la sogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ste skyed par byed pa nyid 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las gzhan skye ba bzhin du shes pa las kyang gzugs la sogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ste skyed par byed pa nyid 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don
translated: The statement ‚Äúat that time‚Äù means that the producer is not the apprehender because that would be absurd.

original: to // ngo bo bzhin du bskyed bya'i khyad par la yang zhing la sogs pa bzhin du sa bon 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: to // ngo bo bzhin du bskyed bya'i khyad par la yang zhing la sogs pa bzhin du sa bon 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as the nature of the object is produced, the object to be produced is not apprehended by the seed, as in the case of the field and so on.

original: dbang po la sogs pa nyid las khyad par can du 'byung ba na shes pa 'bras bu gzhan las lhag pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa nyid las khyad par can du 'byung ba na shes pa 'bras bu gzhan las lhag pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When it arises as superior to the faculties, etc., it is taught that consciousness is the effect that is superior to other things.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos bo ni 'dzin pa med pa las khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos bo ni 'dzin pa med pa las khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: The entity of the object grasped and the grasper is not endowed with superiority over non-grasping,

original: rang gi rgyud nyid las byung ba'i phyir ram gzung ba'i shes pa las bum pa bzhin du 'dzin pa skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi rgyud nyid las byung ba'i phyir ram gzung ba'i shes pa las bum pa bzhin du 'dzin pa skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: because it arises from its own continuum, or because it is not a collection that generates grasping, like a pot from the consciousness of the object grasped.

original: gang gi tshe shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúwhen consciousness . . .‚Äù

original: bdag dang yid phrad pa las byung ba'i mngon sum dang don gyis go ba'i shes pa gzhan yang 'di la yang ste /
analyzed: bdag dang yid phrad pa las byung ba'i mngon sum dang don gyis go ba'i shes pa gzhan yang 'di la yang ste /
translated: Also, in this case, direct perception and other consciousnesses that arise from the contact of self and mind

original: 'das pa @190b 'dzin pa la de'i rnam pa nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'das pa @190b 'dzin pa la de'i rnam pa nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: are the aspect of that in the grasping of the past. This is the meaning.

original: cig car ba nyid de cig car shes pa byung ba ni yid kyi rtags yin no zhes pa 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gnyis dus mnyam par zhes bya ba'o //üîΩcig car skye ba 'gal ba yin gyi yod pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ba la dus mnyam pa nyid yin na yang bya ba ste /
analyzed: cig car ba nyid de cig car shes pa byung ba ni yid kyi rtags yin no zhes pa 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gnyis dus mnyam par zhes bya ba'o // cig car skye ba 'gal ba yin gyi yod pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ba la dus mnyam pa nyid yin na yang bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning is that there is an infinite regress of apprehenders.üîΩAlso, the object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.

original: 'dzin byed 'dzin pa yin na gzung bya 'dzin pa gzhan las de dang de'i 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dzin byed 'dzin pa yin na gzung bya 'dzin pa gzhan las de dang de'i 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.

original: don yang zhes bya ba ni shes pa nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de 'dzin par 'dod pa yang rigs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni dang po gzung ba zhes bya ba ste /üîΩdang po zhes bya ba ni snga ma'o //
analyzed: don yang zhes bya ba ni shes pa nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de 'dzin par 'dod pa yang rigs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni dang po gzung ba zhes bya ba ste / dang po zhes bya ba ni snga ma'o //
translated: The meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.üîΩThe object is not the object of the apprehender, because the object is not the object of the apprehender.

original: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus na med pa'o //
analyzed: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus na med pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the object is not the object of the apprehender.

original: gzung ba ma yin te skad cig pa yin pa'i phyir dang / mthar thug par 'dzin pa'i phyir dang de'i dus ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba ma yin te skad cig pa yin pa'i phyir dang / mthar thug par 'dzin pa'i phyir dang de'i dus ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not apprehended because it is momentary, because it is apprehended as final, and because it is not at that time.

original: yod na yang gzhan rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yod na yang gzhan rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Even if it exists, it is understood as other,

original: de de'i dus can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de de'i dus can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is not at that time. The statement ‚ÄúIt is of that nature‚Äù is taught.

original: de'i dus na gzung ba yin na 'dzin byed dang 'dzin pa yang de'i dus na yin te /
analyzed: de'i dus na gzung ba yin na 'dzin byed dang 'dzin pa yang de'i dus na yin te /
translated: If it is apprehended at that time, the apprehender and the apprehended exist at that time.

original: dus gzhan na ni de dang de'i rnam pa yin te /
analyzed: dus gzhan na ni de dang de'i rnam pa yin te /
translated: At another time, it is of that aspect,

original: de'i rnam pa ma yin pa ni de'i 'dzin byed ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ba ni sngar yang zhes bya ba nas thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ma yin pa ni de'i 'dzin byed ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ba ni sngar yang zhes bya ba nas thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: because that which is not of that aspect is not its apprehender. It is said to be with aspect. The statement ‚ÄúIt would follow that‚Ä¶‚Äù is up to ‚Äúbecause it is already so.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i ste rig pa'i'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i ste rig pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the apprehended, i.e., the object.

original: de lta bu yang zhes bya ba ni rig pa nyid yin na dbang po las skyes pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de lta bu yang zhes bya ba ni rig pa nyid yin na dbang po las skyes pa nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch‚Äù refers to the cognition itself, because it is produced from the sense faculty.

original: dbang po de ma yin pa las log pa ni de nyid kyi bskyed bya ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po de ma yin pa las log pa ni de nyid kyi bskyed bya ma yin te /
translated: That which is not a sense faculty is not the effect of that,

original: skad cig ma'i skyed byed nyid la sogs pa ma rtogs pas dbang po ma yin pa la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i skyed byed nyid la sogs pa ma rtogs pas dbang po ma yin pa la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not a producer of the momentary, etc., and because it is not a sense faculty, etc.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa yang te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa yang te /
translated: The form of apprehension is either different or not different.

original: gzhan du na mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not reasonable in any other way.

original: gzhan du na ni phyi nas so //
analyzed: gzhan du na ni phyi nas so //
translated: Otherwise, it would be later.

original: de lta ma yin pa ni don gyi dus dang de dang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo dag go //
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa ni don gyi dus dang de dang tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo dag go //
translated: Otherwise, the time of the object and its nature would not be different.

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni skyes bu gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni skyes bu gzhan gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äôs‚Äù means another person‚Äôs.

original: rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba ni tha snyad do //
analyzed: rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba ni tha snyad do //
translated: ‚ÄúConception‚Äù means convention.

original: tshogs pa nges par byed pa skye bas 'dzin pa na ji ltar nges pa yin zhes zer ba la de byas shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa nges par byed pa skye bas 'dzin pa na ji ltar nges pa yin zhes zer ba la de byas shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When the arising of the ascertainment of the collection is apprehended, how is it ascertained? It is said that it is known by that.

original: 'dzin pa la nges pa'i gzung bya'i don snang ba nyid kyi phyir te rnam pa las so //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la nges pa'i gzung bya'i don snang ba nyid kyi phyir te rnam pa las so //
translated: Because the object to be ascertained in the apprehension appears in the form, that is, from the aspect.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par sgro btags pa'i don no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par sgro btags pa'i don no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means the object of imputation.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'o //üîΩgzhan ni ma @191a * //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'o // gzhan ni ma @191a * //
translated: ‚ÄúManifest‚Äù means the apprehender.

original: yin te de'i rnam pas rig par nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin te de'i rnam pas rig par nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not other than that, because it is ascertained as cognition in its aspect.

original: de'i bdag nyid yin pas de nyid de'i rnam pa yin gyi don rig pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yin pas de nyid de'i rnam pa yin gyi don rig pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Since it is of the nature of that, it is in the aspect of that, not in the aspect of the object, because that does not enter into it.

original: de 'di la rjes su ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni brjod pa yin zhes bya ba ste /üîΩnges pa'i rnam par rig pa ni lkog tu gyur pa ni de lta bu nyid du nges pa la ltos pa ma yin te /üîΩgsal ba'i phyir gzhan du na de med pas logs na gnas pa nyams su myong bas nyams su myong ba ma yin pa'i bdag nyid thob ba'i phyir de lta bu nyid ma yin na rjes su dpag pa las byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'di la rjes su ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni brjod pa yin zhes bya ba ste / nges pa'i rnam par rig pa ni lkog tu gyur pa ni de lta bu nyid du nges pa la ltos pa ma yin te / gsal ba'i phyir gzhan du na de med pas logs na gnas pa nyams su myong bas nyams su myong ba ma yin pa'i bdag nyid thob ba'i phyir de lta bu nyid ma yin na rjes su dpag pa las byung ba ma yin te /
translated: This is what is taught by the statement:

original: snga na med par rig pa rgyu mtshan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga na med par rig pa rgyu mtshan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAscertained cognition does not depend on thatness in the case of the manifest, because it is manifest. Otherwise, since it would not exist, it would not be experienced as abiding elsewhere, and it would not be ascertained as thatness, because it would obtain a nature that is not experienced. It is not derived from inference, because prior nonexistence is not the reason.‚Äù

original: don rig na yang snga rol du de ma yin pa'i rtog pas 'di de kho na nyid rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: don rig na yang snga rol du de ma yin pa'i rtog pas 'di de kho na nyid rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba yin la /
translated: If it cognizes an object, it contradicts the prior conception that it is not that.

original: de nyid las gzhan nyid du sgro btags pa ni rjes su dpag las log par 'gyur ba'am don la rnam par gzhag pa yang yin te /üîΩrjes su ste rnam pa rig pa'i phyi nas don la dpog pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid las gzhan nyid du sgro btags pa ni rjes su dpag las log par 'gyur ba'am don la rnam par gzhag pa yang yin te / rjes su ste rnam pa rig pa'i phyi nas don la dpog pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin te /
translated: It is also the opposite of inference, since it superimposes identity or difference onto that object.üîΩIt is conceptual, because it infers an object later, after the aspect is cognized.

original: des don rnam par 'jog pas don rnams la ste /
analyzed: des don rnam par 'jog pas don rnams la ste /
translated: It is conceptual, because it determines objects.

original: nges par 'dzud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par 'dzud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is conceptual, because it engages objects.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa'i nges pa ni rang las nges pa yin par bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa'i nges pa ni rang las nges pa yin par bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the determination of the aspect is taught to be self-determination.

original: de med kyang zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i dus na skyed par byed pa nyid yin pas cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir sngar byung ba'i don des byas pa ni shes pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de med kyang zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i dus na skyed par byed pa nyid yin pas cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir sngar byung ba'i don des byas pa ni shes pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Even without that, since it is the producer at the time of consciousness, it is not simultaneous. Therefore, the object that arose earlier is the cause of consciousness.

original: de'i rnam pa ni don de dang 'dra ba'i bskyed bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ni don de dang 'dra ba'i bskyed bya'o //
translated: Its aspect is the production of an image that resembles that object.üîΩIf that is not established, then what is the basis of its aspect?

original: gal te de ma grub na de'i rnam pa nyid ci las yin zhe na de grub par bstan pa ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te de ma grub na de'i rnam pa nyid ci las yin zhe na de grub par bstan pa ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: To demonstrate its establishment, he says, ‚ÄúIt is not known by another.‚Äù

original: rang rig pa ni gzhan gyis rig par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang rig pa ni gzhan gyis rig par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Self-awareness is not known by another.

original: rang ngam zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dbang po la sogs pa rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang ngam zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dbang po la sogs pa rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Itself‚Äù means that the aspect does not exist in the sense faculties, etc.

original: gnas na ni grub na'o //
analyzed: gnas na ni grub na'o //
translated: ‚Äú If it exists‚Äù means if it is established.

original: de med par zhes bya ba ni de'i rnam pa'i skyed byed kyi don med na ste bag chags tsam gyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir nya phyis la dngul du lta bu'o //
analyzed: de med par zhes bya ba ni de'i rnam pa'i skyed byed kyi don med na ste bag chags tsam gyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir nya phyis la dngul du lta bu'o //
