translated: ‚Äú Without it‚Äù means without the object that produces its aspect, because it is the product of mere latent impressions, like the perception of silver in a shell.

original: don dam par zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan la snang ba dag gi dbye ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir nges pa gal te ma yin na zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: don dam par zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan la snang ba dag gi dbye ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir nges pa gal te ma yin na zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: ‚Äú Ultimately‚Äù means that if it is not ascertained by the reasoning that ‚Äúit is not known by another,‚Äù then the distinction between the appearance of self and other is not experienced.

original: rjes dpag la ltos na zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba mngon sum ma yin bas skyed par byed pa ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes dpag la ltos na zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba mngon sum ma yin bas skyed par byed pa ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In comparison with inference, the object to be attained is not manifest, because the producer is not known.

original: long ba zhes bya ba ni rtog pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: long ba zhes bya ba ni rtog pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The blind man is only a metaphor.

original: thams cad de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni khas blangs pa las kyang yod pas @191b de lta bur gyur pa'i lud la goms pas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni khas blangs pa las kyang yod pas @191b de lta bur gyur pa'i lud la goms pas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All that is reality is also accepted as existing, because it is accepted as such by one who is accustomed to reality.

original: snang bzhin pa nyid kyi don la de ma yin pa'i ngo bo mi rig pa'i phyir shes pa'i rnam pa'i rtog par rjes su dpag pa las 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang bzhin pa nyid kyi don la de ma yin pa'i ngo bo mi rig pa'i phyir shes pa'i rnam pa'i rtog par rjes su dpag pa las 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Is it not the case that the form of consciousness is inferred from the fact that the object which appears does not have a nature which is other than that?

original: rtogs pa'i rnam pa ni bdag nyid du gyur pa rig nges par byed pa yin gyi rjes su dpag par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rnam pa ni bdag nyid du gyur pa rig nges par byed pa yin gyi rjes su dpag par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The form of understanding is known to be the nature of the self, but it is not an inference.

original: lhan cig skyes pa yang shes pa bzhin du rtogs pa'i bdag nyid du phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa ni rnam pa dang khyad par byed ba 'gal ba dang gzung ba nyid la yang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa yang shes pa bzhin du rtogs pa'i bdag nyid du phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa ni rnam pa dang khyad par byed ba 'gal ba dang gzung ba nyid la yang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Nor does the connate assist the nature of cognition, since it is the opposite of a form and a differentiator, and it is also the opposite of an object.

original: skyes pa ni skyes par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: skyes pa ni skyes par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The arisen is the arisen.

original: gzung ba nyid la 'gal ba dmigs par bstan pa ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzung ba nyid la 'gal ba dmigs par bstan pa ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the contradiction in the object is ‚Äúconnate.‚Äù

original: de'i rnam pa khyad par byed pa 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni des phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa khyad par byed pa 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni des phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the contradiction in the form and the differentiator is ‚Äúbecause it does not assist it.‚Äù

original: rnam pa med kyang yul nyid yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i gzung bya yin no snyam du sems pa la shes la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa med kyang yul nyid yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i gzung bya yin no snyam du sems pa la shes la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One might think that even without a form, it is the object of cognition, since it is an object. ‚Äú Cognition‚Äù is stated.

original: yul nyid ni rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin na de med na ji ltar yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul nyid ni rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin na de med na ji ltar yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since being an object is pervaded by having a form, how could it be so if that does not exist? This is the meaning.

original: rigs pa yin te zhes bya ba ni gzhan du na thal ches ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa yin te zhes bya ba ni gzhan du na thal ches ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is reasonable, because otherwise it would be absurd.

original: shes pa'i dus su zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i dus su zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt the time of cognition‚Äù means at the time of apprehension.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa nyid shes pa dang lhan cig yod pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa nyid shes pa dang lhan cig yod pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: ‚ÄúJust as‚Äù means that the object is known because it exists simultaneously with the cognition that produces it.

original: ; gzung bar bya ba'i rdo rje dang rdo ba la sogs pa yang shes pa skyed na gang gi tshe skyed par byed pa de'i tshe bdag nyid thams cad kyis rtogs pa'i phyir rtogs pa nye ba yin pas 'dzin par byed pa'i dus na med pa ma yin
analyzed: ; gzung bar bya ba'i rdo rje dang rdo ba la sogs pa yang shes pa skyed na gang gi tshe skyed par byed pa de'i tshe bdag nyid thams cad kyis rtogs pa'i phyir rtogs pa nye ba yin pas 'dzin par byed pa'i dus na med pa ma yin
translated: If the object to be apprehended, such as a diamond or a stone, produces cognition, then when it produces it, it is not nonexistent at the time of apprehension, because it is known through the whole of itself.

original: par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: par bstan pa ni /
translated: This is demonstrated by the line:

original: brtan gang rdo rje rdo sogs kyi /üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brtan gang rdo rje rdo sogs kyi / zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe diamond, stone, etc.

original: shes pa ni cig car rang nyid skyed bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni cig car nyid shes byar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni cig car rang nyid skyed bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni cig car nyid shes byar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCognition arises simultaneously with itself‚Äù means that it becomes an object of cognition simultaneously.

original: gzhan yang de ltar 'dzin par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni kun gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de ltar 'dzin par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni kun gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, this is demonstrated by the line: ‚ÄúAll of it.‚Äù

original: rang gi ngo bos de'i tshe nyid 'byung na ngo bo gzhan gyis ni 'dzin pa'i dus na yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni rang nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos de'i tshe nyid 'byung na ngo bo gzhan gyis ni 'dzin pa'i dus na yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni rang nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: If it were to arise at that time by its own nature, then it would be apprehended at the time of its apprehension by another nature.

original: ngo bo gzhan ni de nyid kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo gzhan ni de nyid kyi ma yin no //
translated: This is indicated by the words ‚Äúitself‚Äù and ‚Äúnot that.‚ÄùüîΩIf there is no difference, why is it not so at another time?

original: dbye ba med kyang dus gzhan la ji ltar ma yin zhes zer ba la gzhan la ltos med phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbye ba med kyang dus gzhan la ji ltar ma yin zhes zer ba la gzhan la ltos med phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúBecause it does not depend on another.‚Äù

original: dbye ba med pa'i ngo bo ni gzhan la ma ltos par rdzogs pa ni de'i tshe nyid du yin gyi dus gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbye ba med pa'i ngo bo ni gzhan la ma ltos par rdzogs pa ni de'i tshe nyid du yin gyi dus gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: An undifferentiated nature is complete without depending on another. It is at that time, not at another time,

original: de la dbang ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa ni dus kyi cha yin zhes bya ba'o //üîΩshes pa @192a * //
analyzed: de la dbang ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa ni dus kyi cha yin zhes bya ba'o // shes pa @192a * //
translated: because it is not under the influence of that. The meaning of this explanation is stated in the words ‚Äúbecause it is a part of time.‚Äù

original: gcig gi dus nyid du zhes bya ba ni shes pa gcig la skyed pa'i dus nyid na'o //
analyzed: gcig gi dus nyid du zhes bya ba ni shes pa gcig la skyed pa'i dus nyid na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt the time of a single cognition‚Äù means at the time of the production of a single cognition.

original: rtag pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus na shes pa la sogs pa bzhin du yod na'o //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus na shes pa la sogs pa bzhin du yod na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt would not be permanent‚Äù means if it existed at the time of its apprehension, like a cognition and so on.

original: de nyid bstan pa ni de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ste skyed par byed pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ni de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ste skyed par byed pa'i dus na'o //
translated: The teaching of that is ‚Äúat that time,‚Äù i.e., at the time of production.

original: dus kyang gcig yin pas de nyid kyi char 'gyur bar bstan pa ni dus kyi cha mtha' dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus kyang gcig yin pas de nyid kyi char 'gyur bar bstan pa ni dus kyi cha mtha' dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: Since the time is one, the teaching of its parts is ‚Äúall the parts of the time.‚Äù

original: shes pa gcig la yang de lta bur yin par bstan pa ni shes pa gcig la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa gcig la yang de lta bur yin par bstan pa ni shes pa gcig la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that it is so in one consciousness is ‚Äúin one consciousness.‚Äù

original: skad cig re re zhing shes pa'i byed pa po tha dad kyang las gcig ma yin par bstan pa ni lhan cig byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig re re zhing shes pa'i byed pa po tha dad kyang las gcig ma yin par bstan pa ni lhan cig byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that even though the agents of consciousness are different in each moment, the action is not one is ‚Äúthe co-operators.‚Äù

original: 'byung na zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: 'byung na zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf they arise‚Äù means they have the nature of arising.

original: de dag ni shes pa dag go //
analyzed: de dag ni shes pa dag go //
translated: Those are the consciousnesses.

original: skyed par byed pa'i shes bya'i ngo bo tha dad pa rtogs par byed pa de'i de nyid de shes pa la sogs pa'i skyon 'di la yang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje la sogs pa la'am bum pa la sogs pa'i skyon yang ngo //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i shes bya'i ngo bo tha dad pa rtogs par byed pa de'i de nyid de shes pa la sogs pa'i skyon 'di la yang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje la sogs pa la'am bum pa la sogs pa'i skyon yang ngo //
translated: The realization of the different natures of the objects of consciousness that are produced is their reality. The fault of consciousness, etc., in that is ‚Äúthe fault of the vajra, etc.,‚Äù or ‚Äúthe fault of the pot, etc.‚Äù

original: tshogs pa las byung ba cig car gnyi ga yang gzung ba la sogs pa nyid dang sbyor ba ma yin par bstan pa ni sngar bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa las byung ba cig car gnyi ga yang gzung ba la sogs pa nyid dang sbyor ba ma yin par bstan pa ni sngar bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The simultaneous arising of both the collection and the non-collection is not apprehended, etc.

original: skye ba ni des pa can yin la 'dzin ba la sogs pa ni ma yin te 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba ni des pa can yin la 'dzin ba la sogs pa ni ma yin te 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The arising is sequential, not the apprehension, etc., because there is no apprehension.

original: shes pa tha dad pa yin na des byas pa de'i yul nyid kyi ngo bo yang tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa tha dad pa yin na des byas pa de'i yul nyid kyi ngo bo yang tha dad pa yin te /
translated: If the cognitions are different, then the object produced by them would also be different in nature,

original: yul ma yin pa la de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni shes pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul ma yin pa la de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni shes pa rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because there is no such thing as a non-object. This is shown by the words ‚Äúthe cognitions, etc.‚Äù

original: de lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is not like that.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no prior or subsequent.

original: rag las pa'am zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba nyid do //
analyzed: rag las pa'am zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúDependent‚Äù means suitable to appear.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni shes pas byas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni shes pas byas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means produced by cognition.

original: snang du rung ba nyid ni shes pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: snang du rung ba nyid ni shes pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the suitability to appear cognition, not something else?

original: de'i rgyu mig la sogs pa gcig yin pa de'i phyir de yang gcig yin no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mig la sogs pa gcig yin pa de'i phyir de yang gcig yin no //
translated: Because its cause, the eye, etc., is one, therefore it also is one.

original: de zer ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de zer ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúca‚Äù (also) is used in the sense of ‚Äúatha‚Äù (if).

original: rang gi rgyu las nye bar bsgrubs pas te bskyed pa'i mig la sogs pa gang gi yin pa de'o //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las nye bar bsgrubs pas te bskyed pa'i mig la sogs pa gang gi yin pa de'o //
translated: That which is produced, generated, by its own cause, the eye, etc., is that.

original: rtags nyid ni gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtags nyid ni gnas pa nyid do //
translated: The very reason is the very basis.

original: mig mi 'dzums par yang mthong yang skad cig re re zhing mig nye ba la ltos par de lta bu'i khyad par gyi snang ba nyid kyang rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni rdo rje dang rdo la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mig mi 'dzums par yang mthong yang skad cig re re zhing mig nye ba la ltos par de lta bu'i khyad par gyi snang ba nyid kyang rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni rdo rje dang rdo la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though the eye is not closed, the perception of the appearance of that kind is understood as depending on the eye at each moment. This is shown by the words ‚Äúthe diamond, the stone, etc.‚Äù

original: rnam pa kun du zhes bya ba ni mi 'dzums pa dang cig shos kyis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du zhes bya ba ni mi 'dzums pa dang cig shos kyis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn every way‚Äù means that it is not understood by the closed eye or the other eye.

original: de'i tshe na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist at that time.

original: mthong ba nyid tha mi dad pa la ma yin nam rtogs pa ni tha dad pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir dang don gcig gi yul can @192b yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: mthong ba nyid tha mi dad pa la ma yin nam rtogs pa ni tha dad pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir dang don gcig gi yul can @192b yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Is it not the case that the seeing itself is not different, because the realization has a different object and because it has the same object?

original: tha mi dad pa la yang tha snyad yin par bstan pa ni dus phyis dran pa zhes bya ba ste 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni mthong pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang gi rig pa nyid kyang sngon bor nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa la yang tha snyad yin par bstan pa ni dus phyis dran pa zhes bya ba ste 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni mthong pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang gi rig pa nyid kyang sngon bor nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In order to show that it is also conventional when they are not different, he says, ‚ÄúLater, there is memory,‚Äù because it is certain that the self-awareness of the nature of seeing, ‚ÄúI saw this,‚Äù is prior.

original: shes pa med par zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag tha mi dad pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa med par zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag tha mi dad pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚Äú Without consciousness‚Äù means that seeing and conception are not different.

original: rig par bya ba zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rig par bya ba zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú The object of awareness‚Äù means the nature of consciousness.

original: yul de sngon po la sogs pa de'i shes pa nyid bye brag yin pa de las mthong ba ni rang nyid dang yul yang rig pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul de sngon po la sogs pa de'i shes pa nyid bye brag yin pa de las mthong ba ni rang nyid dang yul yang rig pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚Äú That object, blue, etc.,‚Äù means that the consciousness itself is the difference. From that, ‚Äúseeing‚Äù means that both itself and the object are awareness.

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas ji ltar zhes bya ba'i bar ni rgol ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas ji ltar zhes bya ba'i bar ni rgol ba yin te /
translated: The passage from ‚Äúconsciousness‚Äù up to ‚Äúhow?‚Äù is the objection.

original: tshul gnyis pa ni yul gyi ste rang gi rig pa dang gzhan gyi rig pa la yang skyon med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshul gnyis pa ni yul gyi ste rang gi rig pa dang gzhan gyi rig pa la yang skyon med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The second method is the object‚Äôs, which means that there is no fault in either self-awareness or other-awareness.

original: skabs las zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa nyid med na yul nyid mi rigs par 'gyur te ma rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs las zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa nyid med na yul nyid mi rigs par 'gyur te ma rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú In that case‚Äù means that if self-awareness did not exist, the object would not be tenable because it would not be cognized.

original: shes pa'i rig pa byed pa po nyid du khas blangs pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi rig pa yang rtogs pa yin la yul gyi rnam pa nyid ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni der yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i rig pa byed pa po nyid du khas blangs pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi rig pa yang rtogs pa yin la yul gyi rnam pa nyid ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni der yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is accepted that the awareness of the object is the agent, self-awareness is also established because it is the realization, and the object‚Äôs aspect is not like that. The demonstration of the proof is ‚Äúin that case.‚Äù

original: 'dod pa ni log par rtogs pa yin pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni log par rtogs pa yin pa'i bar ro //
translated: ‚Äú Desire‚Äù is up to ‚Äúwrong conception.‚Äù

original: rig bya las rig pa ni rang nyid kyis lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kho na khyad par yin par bstan pa ni de dag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rig bya las rig pa ni rang nyid kyis lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kho na khyad par yin par bstan pa ni de dag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The demonstration that the difference is that the object of awareness is not hidden to itself is ‚Äúby those.‚Äù

original: de dag nyid kyis ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyis ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Because they are not hidden from themselves.

original: yang dag dran las ni rig pa la rjes su 'jug pa ma yin pa mi rigs pas mi dran pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag dran las ni rig pa la rjes su 'jug pa ma yin pa mi rigs pas mi dran pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not reasonable that there be a non-concomitant of awareness, since it is not forgotten.

original: rang rig pa la ni gzhan rig pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa la ni gzhan rig pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: In self-awareness, there is no other awareness.

original: rig pa tsam zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa tsam ste /
analyzed: rig pa tsam zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa tsam ste /
translated: Awareness-only means that it is not hidden.

original: sngon po rig pa lkog tu ma gyur pa la log par rtog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon po rig pa lkog tu ma gyur pa la log par rtog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the awareness of blue is not imagined to be hidden.

original: rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis sgrub pa nyid ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis sgrub pa nyid ma yin pa'o //
translated: Self-awareness means that it is not established by another.

original: rnam par phye nas ni gsal ba'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: rnam par phye nas ni gsal ba'i ngo bos so //
translated: In the analysis, it is by the nature of clarity.

original: don gyi rnam pa bzhin du shes pa la yang dran pa yin te /
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa bzhin du shes pa la yang dran pa yin te /
translated: In the cognition that is like the form of the object, there is memory.

original: des na sngar gnyi ga nyams su myong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: des na sngar gnyi ga nyams su myong ba ma yin nam /
translated: Therefore, is it not the case that both are experienced previously?

original: ma yin te don dam tsam nyams su myong ba la de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te don dam tsam nyams su myong ba la de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because in the experience of mere ultimate, there is no such thing.

original: dran pa las phyis dus kyang zhes //
analyzed: dran pa las phyis dus kyang zhes //
translated: Later than memory, there is also time.

original: 'di ni brdzun pa nyid sma yin //
analyzed: 'di ni brdzun pa nyid sma yin //
translated: This is just a lie.

original: de nyid tshe 'di yang dag rig /
analyzed: de nyid tshe 'di yang dag rig /
translated: That itself is the correct knowledge of this life.

original: don gyis go bar nye bar skyed //
analyzed: don gyis go bar nye bar skyed //
translated: It is generated by the understanding of the meaning.

original: don de shes par yang dag rig / dran pa las kyang rjes dpag yin //
analyzed: don de shes par yang dag rig / dran pa las kyang rjes dpag yin //
translated: The correct knowledge of that meaning is inference from memory.

original: zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: This is illogical.

original: dran pa las zhes bya bas don gyis go ba nyid khyed kyis bstan pa yin no zhes zer ba ni rnam pa @193a * //
analyzed: dran pa las zhes bya bas don gyis go ba nyid khyed kyis bstan pa yin no zhes zer ba ni rnam pa @193a * //
translated: By ‚Äúfrom memory‚Äù you have taught that it is understanding by the meaning.

original: med pa la yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: med pa la yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is not so,

original: shes pa rang rig pa yin yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa rang rig pa yin yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: even though consciousness is reflexive awareness, it is associated with an aspect.

original: dran pa'i rjes su dpag pa las don mngon sum yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa'i rjes su dpag pa las don mngon sum yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the object is directly perceived from the inference of memory.

original: nyams su myong ba ji lta ba bzhin du dran pa las rnam par rig pa nyams su myong ba ni nyams su myong ba gzhan gyi mtshan nyid kho na 'dis brjod pa yin gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ji lta ba bzhin du dran pa las rnam par rig pa nyams su myong ba ni nyams su myong ba gzhan gyi mtshan nyid kho na 'dis brjod pa yin gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The experience of consciousness just as it is remembered is described as the characteristic of the experience of another. It is not inference.

original: gsal ba'i khyad par nyams su myong ba ma yin pas dran pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni phan tshun zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsal ba'i khyad par nyams su myong ba ma yin pas dran pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni phan tshun zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Since the difference of clarity is not experienced, it is memory.

original: sngon po dang de'i rig pa yang de la gnas par rig pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon po dang de'i rig pa yang de la gnas par rig pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthis is mutual‚Äù is that blue and the awareness of it are known to abide in it.

original: nyams su myong ba la yod pa'i gsal ba'i khyad par nyid bstan pa ni dran ba brjod par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba la yod pa'i gsal ba'i khyad par nyid bstan pa ni dran ba brjod par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The difference of clarity that exists in experience is taught by ‚Äúthe desire to express memory.‚Äù

original: gsal ba tha dad ces bya ba ni sngon po rig pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba tha dad ces bya ba ni sngon po rig pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe difference of clarity‚Äù is the awareness of blue.

original: de'i tshe rig pa zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni rang spyod yul gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe rig pa zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni rang spyod yul gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: At that time, the meaning of ‚Äúawareness‚Äù is taught by ‚Äúthe object of one‚Äôs own experience.‚Äù

original: sngon po la sogs pa rig pa ni phan tshun ma 'dres pa nyid du rig pa ni rang gi rig par bya ba las gzhan du nyams su myong ba'i ma yin par bstan pa ni phye med cing zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa rig pa ni phan tshun ma 'dres pa nyid du rig pa ni rang gi rig par bya ba las gzhan du nyams su myong ba'i ma yin par bstan pa ni phye med cing zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The awareness of blue and so on is known to be mutually undifferentiated. The awareness of one‚Äôs own object of awareness is taught to be not experienced as other than that by ‚Äúwithout interstice.‚Äù

original: rang nyid du gyur ba'i yul gyis rnam pa gzhan dang ldan pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'di ltar te 'di sngon po'o zhes bya ba dang 'di ltar ni min zhes bya ba ni ser po ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid du gyur ba'i yul gyis rnam pa gzhan dang ldan pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'di ltar te 'di sngon po'o zhes bya ba dang 'di ltar ni min zhes bya ba ni ser po ma yin pa'o //
translated: Because consciousness itself has the aspect of the object that has become itself, this is thus, i.e., it is blue, and not thus, i.e., it is not yellow.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dran pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dran pa'o //
translated: This is memory.

original: tha dad med 'gyur gyi dad pa ni gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad med 'gyur gyi dad pa ni gzhan pa'o //
translated: The difference is the other.

original: yul gyi byed pa las de'i rnam pa ma yin yang 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni rnam 'byed min zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yul gyi byed pa las de'i rnam pa ma yin yang 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni rnam 'byed min zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that the object is differentiated from its aspect, which is not its activity. This is shown by the words, ‚ÄúThere is no differentiation.‚Äù

original: shes bzhin du byed pa la yang yul la ma zhugs pa'i phyir dbye ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes bzhin du byed pa la yang yul la ma zhugs pa'i phyir dbye ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that even when one acts with awareness, there is no differentiation because the object does not enter consciousness.

original: shes pa rnams kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yul las rang gi mtshan nyid khyad par gsal ba ni gzhan kho na ma yin nam ma yin par bstan pa ni med pa la rnam 'byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa rnams kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yul las rang gi mtshan nyid khyad par gsal ba ni gzhan kho na ma yin nam ma yin par bstan pa ni med pa la rnam 'byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: Is the object that has become the nature of consciousness not just the specific, clear characteristic? This is denied by the words, ‚ÄúThere is no differentiation.‚Äù

original: mtshe sogs zhes bya ba ni ba li dang mgrin bzangs lta bu dang / mig 'phrul gyi ri lu gnyis la sogs pa dbye ba mi gsal ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshe sogs zhes bya ba ni ba li dang mgrin bzangs lta bu dang / mig 'phrul gyi ri lu gnyis la sogs pa dbye ba mi gsal ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúsuch as twins‚Äù refers to the two pills of the magician, and so on.

original: dran pa la khyad par mi gsal ba'i phyir mi gsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa la khyad par mi gsal ba'i phyir mi gsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause of the lack of clarity of memory‚Äù means that the memory is unclear because of the lack of clarity of the object.

original: gal te zhes bya ba nas dran par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rang spyod yul gyis phyir med cing zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba nas dran par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rang spyod yul gyis phyir med cing zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: The passage from ‚ÄúIf‚Äù up to ‚Äúthere is no memory‚Äù explains the phrase ‚Äúbecause of the absence of an object that is its own domain.‚Äù

original: 'on te zhes bya ba nas dran pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni nyams su myong ba tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba @193b bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba nas dran pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni nyams su myong ba tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba @193b bshad pa'o //
translated: The passage from ‚ÄúBut if‚Äù up to ‚Äúthere is memory‚Äù explains the phrase ‚Äúbecause of the mere experience.‚Äù

original: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúsome‚Äù refers to the distinction of intrinsic identity.

original: brtag pa zhes bya ba ste rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs las so //
analyzed: brtag pa zhes bya ba ste rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs las so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe investigation‚Äù means the distinction.

original: rgyu ma yin ba yul ma yin pa'i phyir de med pas rnam pa med pa'i shes pa mi dbye ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni yul gyi rnam pa nyid med par zhes bya ba ste nyams su myong ba'i yul dran pa
analyzed: rgyu ma yin ba yul ma yin pa'i phyir de med pas rnam pa med pa'i shes pa mi dbye ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni yul gyi rnam pa nyid med par zhes bya ba ste nyams su myong ba'i yul dran pa
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúThe aspect of the object is remembered.‚Äù

original: ni de'i rnam pa'o //üîΩmngon sum las gzhan du 'das pa yang re zhig dmigs pa ma yin te 'das pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni /

original: tha mi dad par nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba la yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni rnam pa de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad par nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba la yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni rnam pa de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is experienced as not different. The statement that it is also experienced is ‚Äúin that way.‚Äù

original: ci ste zhes bya ba ni rim pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba ni rim pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú If‚Äù is in order.

original: nyams su myong ba bzhin du don nyid las dran pa rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid ji ltar yin zhing gang las de de'i rnam pa can yin zhes zer ba la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba bzhin du don nyid las dran pa rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid ji ltar yin zhing gang las de de'i rnam pa can yin zhes zer ba la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is memory endowed with the aspect of the object itself, as it is experienced? And how is it that it has that aspect? He says, ‚Äúbecause it has the aspect of that.‚Äù

original: ci las she na phan mi 'dogs par khyad par med pa'i phyir thal ches pa yin par bstan pa ni don las dran byung na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci las she na phan mi 'dogs par khyad par med pa'i phyir thal ches pa yin par bstan pa ni don las dran byung na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is that? Because there is no difference in the non-utility. The overextension is shown: ‚ÄúIf memory arises from the object.‚Äù

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni don nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni don nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: ‚Äú That itself‚Äù is the nature of the experience of the object.

original: don med na mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i med pa'i las ni de rgyu ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni don med par yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don med na mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i med pa'i las ni de rgyu ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni don med par yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The non-existence in the phrase ‚Äúit does not occur if the object does not exist‚Äù is shown to be not its cause: ‚ÄúEven if the object does not exist.‚Äù

original: rnam pa med pa nyams su myong ba yin na yang dran pas 'di'i rnam ba ji ltar 'dzin pa yin zhes bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa nyams su myong ba yin na yang dran pas 'di'i rnam ba ji ltar 'dzin pa yin zhes bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is an experience without an aspect, how is its aspect apprehended by memory?

original: nyams su myong ba la ni ji ltar nyams su myong ba yod pa nges pa'i phyir don la bzhin du thal ches pa ma yin par bstan pa ni gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba la ni ji ltar nyams su myong ba yod pa nges pa'i phyir don la bzhin du thal ches pa ma yin par bstan pa ni gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: To show that there is no overextension in the case of an experience, because it is ascertained as it is experienced, he says: ‚ÄúWhat is experienced is remembered as experienced.‚Äù

original: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba ni sngon po nyid dang lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba ni sngon po nyid dang lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of both‚Äù means blue and not hidden.

original: rang rig par yang rig pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon po 'dzin pa'i dus na de'i 'dzin pa gzhan mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang / rig pa ma yin bas thug pa med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rig par yang rig pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon po 'dzin pa'i dus na de'i 'dzin pa gzhan mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang / rig pa ma yin bas thug pa med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is also known by itself‚Äù means that at the time of apprehending blue, the apprehension of that does not arise from another, and because it is not non-knowledge, there is no infinite regress.

original: gal te 'dzin byed gzhan med na sngon po nyid lkog tu ma gyur pa yin du zin kyang ji ltar rang rig pa yin zhes zer ba la tshul gnyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gal te 'dzin byed gzhan med na sngon po nyid lkog tu ma gyur pa yin du zin kyang ji ltar rang rig pa yin zhes zer ba la tshul gnyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If there is no other apprehender, even if blue itself is not hidden, how is it known by itself? To explain this, he says: ‚ÄúThe two modes.‚Äù

original: sngon po lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ni tshul gnyis yin la /
analyzed: sngon po lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ni tshul gnyis yin la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúblue is not hidden‚Äù means that there are two modes.

original: de lkog tu gyur ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa @194a * //
analyzed: de lkog tu gyur ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa @194a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is not hidden‚Äù means that it is self-cognized.

original: yin na'o // rang rig phal cher grub pa zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yin na'o // rang rig phal cher grub pa zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúself-cognition is mostly established‚Äù means that it is not hidden.

original: myong ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid de sngon po dang lkog tu ma gyur pa dag ni lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: myong ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid de sngon po dang lkog tu ma gyur pa dag ni lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúexperience is not hidden‚Äù means that blue and what is not hidden are not hidden.

original: phal cher zhes bya ba ni sngon po'o //
analyzed: phal cher zhes bya ba ni sngon po'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúmostly‚Äù means blue.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di la lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid de /
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di la lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid de /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúnot hidden‚Äù means that it is not hidden.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dzin pa yin gyi bsgrub bya nyid du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dzin pa yin gyi bsgrub bya nyid du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is taken to be the proof, but not the probandum.

original: sgrub par byed pas zhes bya ba ni grub bas so //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pas zhes bya ba ni grub bas so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúby the proof‚Äù means by the established.

original: zhal la zhes bya ba bshad pa yang 'di bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhal la zhes bya ba bshad pa yang 'di bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The explanation of the phrase ‚Äúin the face‚Äù should be understood in the same way.

original: gzung dang 'dzin par 'dod pa la //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin par 'dod pa la //
translated: With regard to the assertion of the grasped and the grasper,

original: khyod kyi gcig 'dod de lta min //üîΩde lta'i bdag nyid gcig nyid la //
analyzed: khyod kyi gcig 'dod de lta min // de lta'i bdag nyid gcig nyid la //
translated: You do not assert that!üîΩThere is no example at all

original: khyod la dpe ni 'ga' yang med //
analyzed: khyod la dpe ni 'ga' yang med //
translated: For a single nature such as you describe.

original: ces zer ba ni gal te rang rig pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩmar me la sogs pa rnams bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gsal byed du grags pa gang yin pa de dag gsal bar bya ba'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: ces zer ba ni gal te rang rig pa zhes bya ba'o // mar me la sogs pa rnams bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gsal byed du grags pa gang yin pa de dag gsal bar bya ba'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: If you say that the self is the illuminator of itself,üîΩthen it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.üîΩIf you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.üîΩIf you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.

original: gsal ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ma yin te mar me la sogs pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //üîΩgzhan la ni de ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: gsal ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ma yin te mar me la sogs pa la ni zhes bya ba'o // gzhan la ni de ma yin pa la'o //
translated: If you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.üîΩIf you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.

original: gsal bar bya ba nyid yin par gzung ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni gang tshe de dag ces bya ba'o //üîΩdes ma yin zhes bya ba ni byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba nyid yin par gzung ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni gang tshe de dag ces bya ba'o // des ma yin zhes bya ba ni byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.üîΩIf you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.üîΩIf you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.üîΩIf you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.üîΩIf you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not tenable that the self is the illuminator of itself, because it is not tenable that it is both the illuminator and the illuminated.

original: khyed kyis bdag gzung bya 'dzin par byed pa khas blangs pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te bdag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis bdag gzung bya 'dzin par byed pa khas blangs pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te bdag ces bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that the self is the illuminator of itself, then it is not

original: bdag nyid du ni sems pa can gyi ngo bo nyid du'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid du ni sems pa can gyi ngo bo nyid du'o //
translated: In the nature of a self, that is, in the nature of a cognizer.

original: yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni de'i gzung bya med cing des ni 'dzin pa med ces bya ba'i rigs pa ste sngon por snang ba ni mngon sum yin gyi bdag snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni de'i gzung bya med cing des ni 'dzin pa med ces bya ba'i rigs pa ste sngon por snang ba ni mngon sum yin gyi bdag snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚Äú It does not exist‚Äù means that its object does not exist and that it does not have an object. The meaning is that the appearance as blue is perception, but the appearance as a self is not.

original: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid gzhan gyi gsal bar bya ba nyid ma yin pa ni rang nyid gsal ba gsal ba nyid yin gyi rang nyid la byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid gzhan gyi gsal bar bya ba nyid ma yin pa ni rang nyid gsal ba gsal ba nyid yin gyi rang nyid la byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the otherness of object and subject is not something that is manifested, because it is manifested by itself. It is not an activity that is directed toward itself.

original: de bstan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not taught.

original: de bstan pa ni gang la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni gang la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that‚Äù refers to the teaching.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú For that very reason‚Äù means because it is not something that is manifested and because it does not manifest.

original: de bstan pa ni mig byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni mig byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú It is not taught‚Äù refers to the eye being an agent.

original: dbang po las de 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid yin gyi dbang po nyid de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni de la dbang po zhes bya ba ste dbang po 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po las de 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid yin gyi dbang po nyid de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni de la dbang po zhes bya ba ste dbang po 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The self is the possessor of the sense faculties, not the sense faculties themselves, which are not like that.

original: mar me dang bum pa la sogs pa 'dir dpe yin zhing bde ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: mar me dang bum pa la sogs pa 'dir dpe yin zhing bde ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ngo //
translated: The lamp, pot, etc. are the examples here, and those such as pleasure are the exemplificands.

original: bdag dang sems pa can dang sems pa can du 'du ba yin pas gzung ba nyid ma @194b yin te /
analyzed: bdag dang sems pa can dang sems pa can du 'du ba yin pas gzung ba nyid ma @194b yin te /
translated: Since the self is included among the sentient and the conscious, it is not the object of perception.

original: rang gi rig pa nyid du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni 'du bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa nyid du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni 'du bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that it is self-awareness is ‚Äúby inclusion.‚Äù

original: med do zhes bya ba ni 'du ba can dag tha dad pa yin na 'du ba ma yin la /
analyzed: med do zhes bya ba ni 'du ba can dag tha dad pa yin na 'du ba ma yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúNo‚Äù means that if the included things are different, there is no inclusion;

original: tha mi dad na yang de gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yin na yang ngo //
analyzed: tha mi dad na yang de gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yin na yang ngo //
translated: and if they are not different, there is no inclusion either, since they are both of the same nature.

original: bdag ni sngon po rig pa dang ser po yang ngo zhes tshad ma pa ni bdag tu shes pa'i yul sngon po la sogs pa dang thun mong pa yin gyi de nyid ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni gal te gzung bar bya ba zhesüîΩbya ba ste /
analyzed: bdag ni sngon po rig pa dang ser po yang ngo zhes tshad ma pa ni bdag tu shes pa'i yul sngon po la sogs pa dang thun mong pa yin gyi de nyid ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni gal te gzung bar bya ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The logicians say, The object of the cognition of the self is the blue and so forth that are common, but it is not that very thing.

original: sngon po ni ser por rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon po ni ser por rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that blue is not the cognition of yellow.

original: rang nyid bzhin du tshad ma ba la yang yul thun mong du 'gyur gyi bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba 'di shes pa ldog pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rang nyid bzhin du tshad ma ba la yang yul thun mong du 'gyur gyi bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba 'di shes pa ldog pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Just as it is for oneself, the object is common to the logicians, but the cognition of the self is not reversed.

original: sngon po la sogs pa rnams gzung ba nyid du rang rig pa rjes su 'brang ba na dngos po ldog pa bzhin du dngos po'i shes pa ma yin pa ldog pa yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa rnams gzung ba nyid du rang rig pa rjes su 'brang ba na dngos po ldog pa bzhin du dngos po'i shes pa ma yin pa ldog pa yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: When blue and so forth are followed as the object of reflexive awareness, the cognition of the thing is reversed, but the cognition is not.

original: de ni tshad ma byed pa po dang thun mong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni nga ni dkar sham zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni tshad ma byed pa po dang thun mong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni nga ni dkar sham zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that it is not common to the one who makes the valid cognition is I am fair-skinned.

original: lus ldan pa'i ni lus la gnas pa dag gi ste gzung ba nyid dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i shes pa'i yul la 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lus ldan pa'i ni lus la gnas pa dag gi ste gzung ba nyid dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i shes pa'i yul la 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no contradiction in the cognition of the object of the apprehension of the self of those who have bodies and who abide in the body.

original: rang rig pa yang ma yin pa ni gzung ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa yang ma yin pa ni gzung ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Nor is it reflexive awareness, i.e., it is not the object of apprehension.

original: de yod na yang zhes bya ba ni bdag gis gzugs zhes bya ba'i mthong ba med na yang ngo //
analyzed: de yod na yang zhes bya ba ni bdag gis gzugs zhes bya ba'i mthong ba med na yang ngo //
translated: Even though it exists, i.e., even though the seeing of the form by the self does not exist.

original: mthong ba ni bdag dkar sham mi zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin te ;
analyzed: mthong ba ni bdag dkar sham mi zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin te ;
translated: The seeing is the nature of the self, i.e., the nature of the white man.

original: dkar sham gyi rang bzhin gyi rgyu mtshan nyid yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dkar sham gyi rang bzhin gyi rgyu mtshan nyid yin pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the mere sign of the nature of the white man.

original: 'on kyang yod pa nyid do //üîΩbdag dkar sham mo zhes bya bas gzugs nyid brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni dkar sham la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang yod pa nyid do // bdag dkar sham mo zhes bya bas gzugs nyid brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni dkar sham la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: However, it does exist.üîΩThe statement that the form itself is indicated by the expression ‚Äúthe white man, etc.,‚Äù is the following.

original: gzung ba nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni bdag gi gzugs so zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni bdag gi gzugs so zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The very apprehension, i.e., because there is no ‚Äúmy form.‚Äù

original: 'gal ba can yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag dang dkar sham mo zhes gzung ba nyid la log pas dkar sham dang gzugs dag la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba can yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag dang dkar sham mo zhes gzung ba nyid la log pas dkar sham dang gzugs dag la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it contradictory. This is because the self and the white color are not different in the white color and the form, since the apprehension of the self and the white color is the same.

original: rgyu mtshan ma yin la zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa yod kyang nye bar btags pa med pa'i phyir gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa'i yul du bdag go zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon la sogs pa la yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bden
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ma yin la zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa yod kyang nye bar btags pa med pa'i phyir gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa'i yul du bdag go zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon la sogs pa la yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bden
translated: It is not a reason. This is because the word self is not a subject that is clarified by another, even though there is a connection, since there is no designation. This is true of the words beginning, etc.

original: pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning: it is true.

original: gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan la gtso bo nyid yin par bstan pa ni nga dkar sham mo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan la gtso bo nyid yin par bstan pa ni nga dkar sham mo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason for not being clarified by another is taught to be the principal one: ‚ÄúI am the white color.‚Äù

original: bdag dang bdag gi sgra dag gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba ma yin par brjod pa @195a * //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi sgra dag gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba ma yin par brjod pa @195a * //
translated: The words self and mine are not subjects that are clarified by another.

original: dag sngon po dang bde ba la sogs gtso bo yin par bstan pa ni nga'i bde ba zhes bya ba de drug pas tha dad par brjod pa yang nga'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba de ni smra ba bo'i rtog pa tsam yin gyi dngos su ni ma
analyzed: dag sngon po dang bde ba la sogs gtso bo yin par bstan pa ni nga'i bde ba zhes bya ba de drug pas tha dad par brjod pa yang nga'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba de ni smra ba bo'i rtog pa tsam yin gyi dngos su ni ma
translated: The statement that the blue, pleasure, etc. are primary is also a mere conceptual imputation of the speaker, because the statement ‚Äúmy pleasure‚Äù is expressed as different by the sixth case, but that is not the case in reality.

original: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not so.

original: gzhan dag rtogs pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: gzhan dag rtogs pa yod ma yin //
translated: There is no other cognition.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa dang de dang ldan pa dang bdag nyid dang gnas skabs dang ldan pa'i dbye ba las de lta bu'i dbye ba yin yang nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis yul gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa dang de dang ldan pa dang bdag nyid dang gnas skabs dang ldan pa'i dbye ba las de lta bu'i dbye ba yin yang nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis yul gtso bo yin te /
translated: Although there is such a classification by way of the classification of the collection, the possessor of the collection, the self, the state, and the possessor of the state, the object is primary by way of the nature of experience.

original: de bzhin du ste sems pa can gyi dbye ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du ste sems pa can gyi dbye ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the same way, the meaning is that it is like the classification of the sentient being.

original: snga ma'i zhag la mthong ba phyi ma'i zhag la bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam da ltar yod pa'i bdag nyid la yang de lta bur 'gyur gyi gzhan la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: snga ma'i zhag la mthong ba phyi ma'i zhag la bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam da ltar yod pa'i bdag nyid la yang de lta bur 'gyur gyi gzhan la ni ma yin te /
translated: This would be so if the self existed in the present, but it does not.

original: gzhan 'di ni sngon po'am lus la sogs pa'am nyams su myong ba'o snyam du sems pa la te por btags kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'di ni sngon po'am lus la sogs pa'am nyams su myong ba'o snyam du sems pa la te por btags kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The thought ‚ÄúThis is blue,‚Äù or ‚ÄúThis is a body,‚Äù or ‚ÄúThis is an experience,‚Äù is merely imputed to something else.

original: gzhan dmigs pa ni gzhan las ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dmigs pa ni gzhan las ma yin te /
translated: The object of observation is not different from the self,üîΩbecause it is different from the body, etc.

original: ci las she na gzhan zhes bya ba ste lus la sogs pa las gzhan pa nyid ni gzhan grub na 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: ci las she na gzhan zhes bya ba ste lus la sogs pa las gzhan pa nyid ni gzhan grub na 'grub pa yin te /
translated: If the self were established as different from the body, etc.,

original: bdag go zhes bya ba yang de tsam du nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag go zhes bya ba yang de tsam du nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it would be established as the mere other, and that is all that is meant by ‚Äúself.‚Äù

original: lus sam gzhan yang shes pa po'i rig pa ni skad cig re re zhing tha dad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: lus sam gzhan yang shes pa po'i rig pa ni skad cig re re zhing tha dad pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is the cognition of the body or of something else not different in each moment?

original: nyams su myong ba po'i bdag 'di mthong ngo zhes dan pa ni shes pa po gzhan gyi ma yin gyi yul gzhan yang de'i rang bzhin gyis ma yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba po'i bdag 'di mthong ngo zhes dan pa ni shes pa po gzhan gyi ma yin gyi yul gzhan yang de'i rang bzhin gyis ma yin no //
translated: The self that experiences does not remember ‚ÄúI saw,‚Äù as does another cognizer, nor does it remember as does another object.üîΩThe memory produced by the latent impressions that are not the cognizer, which is not the object, which is not the experience of self-awareness, which is not the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are not ascertained as being uninterrupted, does not remember the experience as it was.üîΩThe memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience of self-awareness, which is the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are ascertained as being uninterrupted, remembers the experience as it was.

original: shes pa po las byung ba ni gzhan la dmigs pa ma yin la rang nyid rig pa'i nyams su myong bas rnam par ma chad par ma nges pa can gyi bag chags kyis byas pa'i sgro 'dogs par bya ba'i dran pa'i rgyu ma yin te nyams su myongüîΩba ji lta ji lta ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa po las byung ba ni gzhan la dmigs pa ma yin la rang nyid rig pa'i nyams su myong bas rnam par ma chad par ma nges pa can gyi bag chags kyis byas pa'i sgro 'dogs par bya ba'i dran pa'i rgyu ma yin te nyams su myong ba ji lta ji lta ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience of self-awareness, which is the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are ascertained as being uninterrupted, remembers the experience as it was.

original: shes pa bo yis ngo shes pa //üîΩbag chags kyis byed 'os yin la //
analyzed: shes pa bo yis ngo shes pa // bag chags kyis byed 'os yin la //
translated: The memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience of self-awareness, which is the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are ascertained as being uninterrupted, remembers the experience as it was.

original: de min pa la der shes pa //üîΩ'di ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: de min pa la der shes pa // 'di ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu ma yin //
translated: The memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience of self-awareness, which is the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are ascertained as being uninterrupted, remembers the experience as it was.üîΩThe memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience of self-awareness, which is the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are ascertained as being uninterrupted, remembers the experience as it was.

original: zhes bstan pa ni thog ma med pa'i zhes bya ba ste nyams su myong ba dang / dran pa dang de'i gnas skabs bar gnas pa rnams tha dad pa yin la /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni thog ma med pa'i zhes bya ba ste nyams su myong ba dang / dran pa dang de'i gnas skabs bar gnas pa rnams tha dad pa yin la /
translated: The memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience of self-awareness, which is the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are ascertained as being uninterrupted, remembers the experience as it was.üîΩThe memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience of self-awareness, which is the cause of the superimposition made by the latent impressions that are ascertained as being uninterrupted, remembers the experience as it was.üîΩThe memory produced by the latent impressions that are the cognizer, which is the object, which is the experience

original: tha mi dad na yang gnyi ga dus gcig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad na yang gnyi ga dus gcig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are not different, then both would be simultaneous.

original: tha mi dad pa yang tha dad par ma mtshon pa la rang gi rig pa rjes su 'jug pa yin na ste de ltar bag chags yongs su smin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yang tha dad par ma mtshon pa la rang gi rig pa rjes su 'jug pa yin na ste de ltar bag chags yongs su smin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If they are not different, then the self-awareness is not manifested as different, but it is engaged in the self-awareness, because the latent potentialities are fully ripened.

original: sngon dang da ltar 'ang bdag rig phyir //
analyzed: sngon dang da ltar 'ang bdag rig phyir //
translated: Because the self is known in the past and in the present,

original: bdag gis 'di ni shes pa yin //
analyzed: bdag gis 'di ni shes pa yin //
translated: it is certain that the self knows this.

original: zhes bya ba nges pa @195b yin gyi ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba ma yin pa la dpa'i rnam pa ste //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nges pa @195b yin gyi ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba ma yin pa la dpa'i rnam pa ste //
translated: This is the form of the self, but it is not the experience of the way things really are.

original: lus dang sngon po la sogs pa bya ba 'brel ba'am zhes bya ba'i don du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang sngon po la sogs pa bya ba 'brel ba'am zhes bya ba'i don du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe body and blue, etc., are related as action and object‚Äù is understood.

original: lus la sogs pa rang la gnas pa rig pa dang / cig shos nyid la yang thams cad kyi phan tshun du 'brel pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa rang la gnas pa rig pa dang / cig shos nyid la yang thams cad kyi phan tshun du 'brel pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: The body, etc., are not related to the self that is located in them, nor are they related to each other,

original: gcig gi bdag nyid rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig gi bdag nyid rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are included in the awareness of a single nature.

original: rig pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi bdag go zhes bya ba lus la bzhin du rtsig pa la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi bdag go zhes bya ba lus la bzhin du rtsig pa la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply to that is, ‚ÄúWell then, how?‚Äù

original: khyad par med par bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par med par bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching without distinction is, ‚ÄúJust as . . .‚Äù

original: des na zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du lus la yang ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du lus la yang ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äútherefore‚Äù is that it is not so with the body.

original: ma shes pa nyid yin yang lus bzhin du rtsig pa la yang cis mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la /üîΩji ltar rang rig min nyid kyang //
analyzed: ma shes pa nyid yin yang lus bzhin du rtsig pa la yang cis mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la / ji ltar rang rig min nyid kyang //
translated: Even though it is not known, why wouldn‚Äôt it be so with a wall, just as it is with the body?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply to that is, ‚ÄúJust as it is not self-awareness . . .‚Äù

original: nges pa'i bag chags yod pas de lta bu'i yul la rtog pa yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar bag chags zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i bag chags yod pas de lta bu'i yul la rtog pa yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar bag chags zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that it is a conception of such an object because of the existence of a latent predisposition is, ‚ÄúJust as a latent predisposition . . .‚Äù

original: rig pa nyams su myong ba ni rtsig pa lkog tu gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rig pa nyams su myong ba ni rtsig pa lkog tu gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: The experience of awareness is not hidden in a wall,

original: rang nyid kho na yin gyi gzhan rig ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid kho na yin gyi gzhan rig ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is itself and not another awareness.

original: gzhan du na thug pa med par bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na thug pa med par bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, the teaching of the infinite regress would be the reason.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba mar me la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba mar me la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the lamp, etc.

original: mig ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i rig pa skyed par byed pa yin gyi 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni mig ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mig ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i rig pa skyed par byed pa yin gyi 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni mig ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The eye is the producer of the awareness of that nature, but it is not the apprehender. This is taught by ‚ÄúThe eye . . .‚Äù

original: gzung ba yin pa'i phyir dang / rang rig pa dang dran pa las nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba yin pa'i phyir dang / rang rig pa dang dran pa las nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the object of apprehension and because it is apprehended by self-awareness and memory.

original: rang rig pa tsam ni bdag tu shes pa'i yul ma yin gyi rtag tu rjes su 'brel pa yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni 'brel mi rtag phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa tsam ni bdag tu shes pa'i yul ma yin gyi rtag tu rjes su 'brel pa yang ngo zhes bstan pa ni 'brel mi rtag phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Mere self-awareness is not the object of the cognition of the self, but it is always related to it. This is taught by ‚ÄúBecause it is not always related . . .‚Äù

original: rtag tu ni ther zug pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtag tu ni ther zug pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means eternally.

original: bdag go zhes bya ba med na gzhan gsal bar byed pa nyid du ji ltar go ba yin zer ba la ngar 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag go zhes bya ba med na gzhan gsal bar byed pa nyid du ji ltar go ba yin zer ba la ngar 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is no ‚Äúself,‚Äù how can it be understood that it illuminates the other? ‚ÄúBecause of the apprehension of the self . . .‚Äù

original: gzhan la ltos pa med par zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig par bya ba mngon sum pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med par zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig par bya ba mngon sum pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase without depending on another means that it is a direct perception that is known by itself.

original: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sdang sngon po la sogs pa bya ba byed pa'i 'dzin par byed pa gzhan mthong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sdang sngon po la sogs pa bya ba byed pa'i 'dzin par byed pa gzhan mthong ba ma yin te /
translated: The phrase having its aspect means having the aspect of the apprehender. It is not the case that the apprehender of a blue patch, etc. is seen as another entity that performs the function of apprehending.

original: bde ba la sogs pa yang nang gi reg bya yin pas gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa yang nang gi reg bya yin pas gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Since pleasure, etc. are internal objects of touch, they are not other.

original: ltos pa med pa ni 'dzin pa la ste las kyi ngo bo med na'o //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa ni 'dzin pa la ste las kyi ngo bo med na'o //
translated: The phrase without depending on another means that there is no function of apprehending if there is no entity of action.

original: rtogs pa med do zhes bya ba ni lus dang bde ba dag rang gi rig pa'i bya ba gcig la zhugs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrkyang ba dmigs @196a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa med do zhes bya ba ni lus dang bde ba dag rang gi rig pa'i bya ba gcig la zhugs pa'i phyir ro // rkyang ba dmigs @196a * //
translated: The phrase there is no cognition means that the body and pleasure, etc. are engaged in the same action of being known by themselves.

original: pa las tha dad pa yin na thams cad mi dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa las tha dad pa yin na thams cad mi dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the solitary is different from the object, it follows that everything is not perceived.

original: tha dad pa yin na yang rang gi rig pa tsam yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid ma yin pa'i ngo bo la ma zhugs pas de min ngo bo mi rigs pas te 'di rig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa yin na yang rang gi rig pa tsam yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid ma yin pa'i ngo bo la ma zhugs pas de min ngo bo mi rigs pas te 'di rig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If they are different, then because it is mere self-awareness, it does not engage the nature of what is not itself, so it is not tenable that it is a different nature.

original: bde ba la sogs pas tha dad na yang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dbye ba 'byed par byed pa ma yin pa nyid yin na de'i dbye ba la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pas tha dad na yang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dbye ba 'byed par byed pa ma yin pa nyid yin na de'i dbye ba la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If pleasure, etc., are different, then the division of the apprehender is not a differentiator, because there is no valid cognition of its division.

original: 'dod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa dang / mdzes pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa dang / mdzes pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: Desire, etc., are not desire, etc., form, etc., and beautiful form, etc.

original: 'dzin par byed pa la ltos pas zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'i khyad par la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa la ltos pas zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'i khyad par la ltos pa ste /
translated: In dependence on the apprehender, the division of the apprehender is not a differentiator.

original: gcig gi gzung ba ni cig shos kyi yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig gi gzung ba ni cig shos kyi yang ma yin te /
translated: The object of one is not the object of another,

original: gcig gi 'gal ba mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig gi 'gal ba mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of one does not apprehend the object of another.

original: 'dzin par byed pa nges pa yin yang dngos po gcig nyid du 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gcig tu rig pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa nges pa yin yang dngos po gcig nyid du 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gcig tu rig pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The following verse shows that it is contradictory for a single entity to be both apprehended and determinate.

original: thams cad ni bde ba la sogs pa dang sngon po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni bde ba la sogs pa dang sngon po la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù refers to pleasure, etc., and blue, etc.

original: de nyid kyi tshe ni sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong ba lkog tu ma gyur pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe ni sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong ba lkog tu ma gyur pa'i dus na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù refers to the time when the experience of blue, etc., is not hidden.

original: sngon po nyams su myong ba lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid de las gzhan du mi 'thad pa'am blo yang rig par 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni 'jig rten rig bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po nyams su myong ba lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid de las gzhan du mi 'thad pa'am blo yang rig par 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni 'jig rten rig bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The following verse shows that the experience of blue, etc., is not hidden, and that it is not tenable that it be otherwise, or that cognition be cognized.

original: shes pa ni rig pa ste lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes pa ni rig pa ste lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúCognition‚Äù is awareness, which is not hidden.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa rig pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la ma gtogs pa don gyis go ba'i yul ma yin par bstan pa ni don goms zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa rig pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la ma gtogs pa don gyis go ba'i yul ma yin par bstan pa ni don goms zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The following verse shows that what is not hidden and is awareness is not a domain that is understood by implication, apart from blue, etc.üîΩ‚ÄúUnderstood by implication‚Äù means understood by implication.

original: rang nyid lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyis sngon po ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par las kyang don gyis go ba la ltos pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang nyid lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyis sngon po ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par las kyang don gyis go ba la ltos pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that, because it is not hidden to itself, it does not depend on understanding the meaning from the distinction of not being blue, etc.

original: snyam pa'i bzung ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi blo'i ngo bo rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gang gi yin pa de de lta bu'i ngo bo'i yul can no //
analyzed: snyam pa'i bzung ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi blo'i ngo bo rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gang gi yin pa de de lta bu'i ngo bo'i yul can no //
translated: The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúthe nature of the cognition that has the distinction ‚Äòthe apprehended aspect, etc.‚Äô ‚Äù is that it is the object of that kind of nature.

original: mthong ba'am rtogs pas kyang ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo tshad ma'i spyod yul ma yin pa ma yin yang med pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni rang bzhin ma rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'am rtogs pas kyang ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo tshad ma'i spyod yul ma yin pa ma yin yang med pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni rang bzhin ma rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though it is not the case that the nature of what is not understood is not the domain of valid cognition through seeing or understanding, it is taught that it is nonexistent alone. ‚Äú Not understanding the nature‚Äù means not apprehending it.

original: de ltar ni mi 'dzin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de ltar ni mi 'dzin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: It is like this: because it is not apprehended,

original: rtogs pa med pa nyid ni 'dzin pa rtogs pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa med pa nyid ni 'dzin pa rtogs pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: it is not understood as apprehended.

original: nga'i zhes bya ba 'di'i don gtso bo yin gyi bdag gi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nga'i zhes bya ba 'di'i don gtso bo yin gyi bdag gi ni ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúmine‚Äù is primary, not ‚ÄúI.‚Äù

original: lus la sogs pa las gzhan rtogs pa ma yin @196b par bstan pa ni blo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa las gzhan rtogs pa ma yin @196b par bstan pa ni blo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the cognition is not different from the body, etc. is ‚Äúmind.

original: drug pa tha dad par tha snyad 'dogs par yang rnam pa 'gas rtog pa tsam yin par bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: drug pa tha dad par tha snyad 'dogs par yang rnam pa 'gas rtog pa tsam yin par bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äù The statement that the designation of difference in the six is in some way mere conceptualization is ‚Äúthe particular of form, etc.

original: ji ltar gzugs dmigs kyis bsal ba la bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs dmigs kyis bsal ba la bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äù The statement that the exclusion of form is taught is ‚Äúform, etc.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gcig gis ma rtogs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang ma rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gcig gis ma rtogs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang ma rtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that if one does not cognize, another does not cognize.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover‚Äù means that one cognizes.

original: gzugs kyi gsal ba'i ngo bo rang rig pa yin par grub pa nyid du bstan pa ni rtogs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi gsal ba'i ngo bo rang rig pa yin par grub pa nyid du bstan pa ni rtogs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the establishment of the nature of the manifestation of form is self-awareness is ‚Äúcognition.

original: smras pa zhes bya ba ni /üîΩde'i tshe bdag gi gzung don la //
analyzed: smras pa zhes bya ba ni / de'i tshe bdag gi gzung don la //
translated: ‚Äù ‚ÄúIt is said‚Äù meansüîΩat that time, I do not recall

original: gang yin bdag gis mi dran pa //üîΩgzung ba'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i //
analyzed: gang yin bdag gis mi dran pa // gzung ba'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i //
translated: the object of apprehension.üîΩThe form of apprehension

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dran par byed //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dran par byed //
translated: is recalled as devoid of the nature of the object of apprehension.

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: khyad par la zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i khyad par gyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par la zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i khyad par gyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn regard to the particular‚Äù means in regard to the final particular of the apprehended.

original: the tshom mi za ba yin no zhes bya ba ni don gang yang gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom mi za ba yin no zhes bya ba ni don gang yang gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no doubt‚Äù means there is the cognition that the object is apprehended.

original: sngon po'i bdag nyid kyi blo nyid blo gzhan gyis gzung ba yin no zhes zer ba ni gzugs sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po'i bdag nyid kyi blo nyid blo gzhan gyis gzung ba yin no zhes zer ba ni gzugs sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of the nature of blue is apprehended by another cognition.

original: re zhig sngon po 'dzin pa'i dus na de 'dzin par byed pa cig car ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig sngon po 'dzin pa'i dus na de 'dzin par byed pa cig car ma yin te /
translated: At the time of apprehending blue, the apprehension of that is not simultaneous,

original: shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cognition has not yet arisen.

original: gzhan la chags pas mi phyogs pa'i phyir rim gyis kyang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa dang / gzung ba yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni de dngos can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan la chags pas mi phyogs pa'i phyir rim gyis kyang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa dang / gzung ba yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni de dngos can zhes bya ba'o //
