translated: Since it is not directed toward another object, it is not reasonable that there is a gradual apprehension, and it is not reasonable that there is an apprehension of the apprehended. This is explained in ‚ÄúThat which has the nature of that . . .‚Äù

original: 'gags zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'o //
analyzed: 'gags zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCeased‚Äù means the apprehended.

original: de zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means the apprehender.

original: shes pa nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir don nyams su myong ba ni de med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir don nyams su myong ba ni de med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it is the nature of the experience of consciousness, the experience of the object is the non-arising of that.

original: khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyu nyid du cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu med yin pa nyid du thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyu nyid du cig car ba ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu med yin pa nyid du thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted, it is not a cause, because it is not simultaneous with the cause.

original: gzung bar bya ba yang sngon po dang de'i shes pa yang ngo //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba yang sngon po dang de'i shes pa yang ngo //
translated: The object to be grasped is blue and its consciousness.

original: mngon sum las gzhan pa'i 'das pa la sogs pa'i yang 'dzin byed ma yin te dngos po med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rang gi ngo bo med pa zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: mngon sum las gzhan pa'i 'das pa la sogs pa'i yang 'dzin byed ma yin te dngos po med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rang gi ngo bo med pa zhes bya ba'o//
translated: It is not a grasper of the past, etc., other than direct perception, because it is a non-entity. This is taught by ‚Äúwithout its own nature.‚Äù

original: rang gi rang bzhin yang na 'dzin par byed pa'i ste khas ma blangs pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba ma yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin yang na 'dzin par byed pa'i ste khas ma blangs pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba ma yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Or it is the grasper of its own nature, because it is not accepted, it is not an experience.

original: thug pa med par zhes bya ba ni 'dzin byed gzhan 'phen pa yin na'o //
analyzed: thug pa med par zhes bya ba ni 'dzin byed gzhan 'phen pa yin na'o //
translated: The infinite regress is if another grasper is projected.

original: 'dzin par byed pa'i rig pa yang gzung ba bzhin du ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa'i rig pa yang gzung ba bzhin du ma yin zhing /
translated: The cognition that apprehends is not like the object apprehended.

original: las med pa nyid kyis yin par bstan pa ni @197a * //
analyzed: las med pa nyid kyis yin par bstan pa ni @197a * //
translated: The absence of an object is indicated by the words

original: don du snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don du snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe appearance of an object.‚Äù

original: gzung bya'i las can gyi shes pa de'i sngon po'i shes pa don du snang ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzung bya'i las can gyi shes pa de'i sngon po'i shes pa don du snang ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The cognition that has the object blue is the cognition that has the appearance of an object.

original: sngon po rig pa'i mngon sum nyid las kyi ngo bos ma yin par bstan pa ni blo la zhes bya ba ste sngon po rig pa la'o //
analyzed: sngon po rig pa'i mngon sum nyid las kyi ngo bos ma yin par bstan pa ni blo la zhes bya ba ste sngon po rig pa la'o //
translated: The cognition of blue is not perception by virtue of its nature as an action. This is indicated by the words ‚Äúin the cognition.‚Äù

original: 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThe apprehender‚Äù is perception.

original: bdag la nang mngon phyogs zhes bya ba ni las dang byed pa po nyid kyi ngo bos ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag la nang mngon phyogs zhes bya ba ni las dang byed pa po nyid kyi ngo bos ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúTurned inward‚Äù is not by virtue of the nature of the action and the agent.

original: mngon sum rig pa 'di las kyi ngo bo med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum rig pa 'di las kyi ngo bo med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that this perception does not have the nature of an action.

original: gal te zhes bya bas don du snang ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya bas don du snang ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa yin no //
translated: The words ‚Äúif it were‚Äù explain the meaning of ‚Äúlike the appearance of an object.‚Äù

original: bdag gcig la 'du ba'i phyir gzung ba dang cig shos kyi blo dag phan tshun rjes su zhugs pas nang du phyogs pa nyid du snang bar mi rigs te dran pa la yang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni 'on te bdag gi nyid kyis
analyzed: bdag gcig la 'du ba'i phyir gzung ba dang cig shos kyi blo dag phan tshun rjes su zhugs pas nang du phyogs pa nyid du snang bar mi rigs te dran pa la yang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni 'on te bdag gi nyid kyis
translated: Because of the unity of the self, the cognition of the object and the cognition of the other, i.e. the self, would be mutually concomitant. Therefore, it is not reasonable that they appear as directed inward, because there is no difference in memory.

original: blo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition is called the self.üîΩThe meaning of the verse is this: Since the appearance as object does not exist, the direction outward is not established in the non-reflexive cognition.

original: don du snang ba dang ldan pa nyid med pas phyi rol du mngon par phyogs pa nyid rang rig pa ma yin pa la 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni yul gang gi ni snang ba gang zhes bya ba ste khyad par du snang ba'o //
analyzed: don du snang ba dang ldan pa nyid med pas phyi rol du mngon par phyogs pa nyid rang rig pa ma yin pa la 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni yul gang gi ni snang ba gang zhes bya ba ste khyad par du snang ba'o //
translated: The verse text says, ‚ÄúThe appearance of which object?‚Äù The appearance as object is specified.

original: yul gang gi zhes bya ba ni bshad pa po'i dang shes pa'i zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: yul gang gi zhes bya ba ni bshad pa po'i dang shes pa'i zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: ‚Äú Of which object‚Äù means of the object of the speaker. ‚Äú Of the cognition‚Äù means of the object of the cognition.

original: de zhes bya ba ni yul du snang ba'am yul yang rung ba de'i shes ba gang gis zhes bya bar bstan pa ni yin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni yul du snang ba'am yul yang rung ba de'i shes ba gang gis zhes bya bar bstan pa ni yin no //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the appearance as object or the object. ‚Äú By which cognition‚Äù is the explanation.

original: rang gi rig pa ma yin gyis rang nyid du gyur pa'i snang ba rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas don rig pa ma yin pa ni bdag nyid snang ba 'dzin pa nyid don 'dzin par ston par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rig pa ma yin gyis rang nyid du gyur pa'i snang ba rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas don rig pa ma yin pa ni bdag nyid snang ba 'dzin pa nyid don 'dzin par ston par byed pa yin te /
translated: Because the appearance that is itself is not awareness, the awareness of the object through that is not the apprehension of the appearance itself.

original: rtsa ba nas 'thung ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba nas 'thung ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: This is like drinking from the root and so on.

original: don du snang ba ni blo ni don rig pa yin gyi bdag nyid rig pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni myong gzhan ci yod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: don du snang ba ni blo ni don rig pa yin gyi bdag nyid rig pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni myong gzhan ci yod ces bya ba ste /
translated: The thought that the appearance of the object is the awareness of the object and not the awareness of itself is ‚ÄúWhat other experience is there?‚Äù

original: myong ba'i bdag nyid ni don rig pa'i ngo bo yin pas rnam pa med pa'i blo mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myong ba'i bdag nyid ni don rig pa'i ngo bo yin pas rnam pa med pa'i blo mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the nature of experience is the essence of the awareness of the object, an awareness without aspects is not tenable.

original: de bshad pa ni gal te blo ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni gal te blo ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is explained by ‚ÄúIf the awareness . . .‚Äù

original: de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba'i don dang 'dra ba'i blo ni don rig pa yin te nges pa rang las rtogs par bya ba tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba'i don dang 'dra ba'i blo ni don rig pa yin te nges pa rang las rtogs par bya ba tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The awareness that is similar to the object, which is the meaning of ‚Äúin the aspect of that,‚Äù is the awareness of the object because it is the mere realization of the ascertainment that is the ultimate of itself.

original: de'i ngo bo yang don bzhin du rtogs bya rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo yang don bzhin du rtogs bya rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: And its nature is just the realization of the object as it is.

original: de yi rang bzhin rig med na //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin rig med na // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To that, the response is, ‚ÄúIf its nature is not known by itself, . . .‚Äù

original: de la yang rang rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni rang rig pa gzhan zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la yang rang rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni rang rig pa gzhan zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúnot by itself‚Äù is shown by ‚Äúby another self-knowing.‚Äù

original: bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rnam pa yang phyi rol nyid du rtogs pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rnam pa yang phyi rol nyid du rtogs pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the aspect that is itself is known as external.

original: de med pas zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa med pas @197b te de dang 'dra ba nyid dam de rig pa'o //
analyzed: de med pas zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa med pas @197b te de dang 'dra ba nyid dam de rig pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Because of the nonexistence of that‚Äù means because of the nonexistence of self-knowing, which is like that, or the knowing of that.

original: myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni nges pa rig pa'o //
analyzed: myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni nges pa rig pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of experience is the ascertainment of knowing.

original: sngar gyi don gyi rnam pa tsam las zhes bya ba ni blo'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi don gyi rnam pa tsam las zhes bya ba ni blo'o //
translated: ‚Äú Just the aspect of the former object‚Äù is the mind.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni rnam pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Otherwise‚Äù is the absence of an aspect.

original: de'i tshe nges pa rig pa ma yin na phyi rol gyi rnam pa yang bor na nges pa'i don du rnam pa gzhan la brten na thug pa med pa yin par bstan pa ni 'dra ba thams cad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe nges pa rig pa ma yin na phyi rol gyi rnam pa yang bor na nges pa'i don du rnam pa gzhan la brten na thug pa med pa yin par bstan pa ni 'dra ba thams cad ces bya ba'o //
translated: If at that time the ascertainment is not cognition, then even the external aspect is abandoned. If the ascertainment depends on another aspect, then there is an infinite regress. This is demonstrated by ‚Äúall similarities.‚Äù

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni don yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni don yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the object.

original: der zhes bya ba ni blo nyid do //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni blo nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to cognition.

original: don nyid kyi phyir ni bems po nyid kyi phyir sngon po ma yin no //üîΩrang gi rig pa ma yin pa las don nyid ni blo yin par mngon par 'dod pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni don zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don nyid kyi phyir ni bems po nyid kyi phyir sngon po ma yin no // rang gi rig pa ma yin pa las don nyid ni blo yin par mngon par 'dod pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni don zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of being an object, it is not blue, because of being insentient.üîΩIf it is asserted that cognition is the object itself, because of being self-cognition, this is demonstrated by ‚ÄúWhat is this so-called object?‚Äù

original: gzhan la mthar thug pa yin pa'i ngo bo don nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni blo ma yin zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan la mthar thug pa yin pa'i ngo bo don nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni blo ma yin zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that the nature of the object is the ultimate, not cognition, this is addressed by ‚ÄúIf it is said that the object is the ultimate nature, not cognition.‚Äù

original: rgyu las gzhan pa mthar thug nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu las gzhan pa mthar thug nyid ma yin te /
translated: The ultimate is not different from the cause.

original: don la yang de khyad par can ma yin par bstan pa ni blo ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba ste blo nyid dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don la yang de khyad par can ma yin par bstan pa ni blo ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba ste blo nyid dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the statement that it is not a special object is that it is not a cognition, that is, it is not endowed with cognition.

original: ngo bo'i nges pa la phyin ci log par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ngo bo'i nges pa la phyin ci log par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not different from the opposite of the ascertainment of its nature.

original: blo ma yin pa nyid ni don ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i blo bkag pa yin na don ma yin pa nyid kyang blo'i don bkag pa yin na dgag bya yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //üîΩbdag nyid ma yin pa rig pa yang de'i ngo bo'i bdag nyid rig pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni nges na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: blo ma yin pa nyid ni don ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i blo bkag pa yin na don ma yin pa nyid kyang blo'i don bkag pa yin na dgag bya yin no zhes dgongs pa'o // bdag nyid ma yin pa rig pa yang de'i ngo bo'i bdag nyid rig pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni nges na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúnot a cognition‚Äù is the negation of a cognition that is not the nature of an object. The meaning of ‚Äúnot an object‚Äù is the negation of an object that is not a cognition. The meaning is that it is the object of negation.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúnot itself‚Äù is that it is the cognition of the nature of itself.

original: bdag nyid la gnas pa'i blo nyid ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid la gnas pa'i blo nyid ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúif it is‚Äù is that it is the cognition that abides in itself.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means in the nature of that.

original: bdag la gnas pa zhes bya ba bdag nyid ma yin pa rig pa ni gzhan gyis ma rig pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni bdag la gnas pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag la gnas pa zhes bya ba bdag nyid ma yin pa rig pa ni gzhan gyis ma rig pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni bdag la gnas pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúResiding in the self‚Äù means that the self is not known by another.

original: 'bad rtsol la sogs zhes bya ba ni 'bad rtsol dang sngon po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bad rtsol la sogs zhes bya ba ni 'bad rtsol dang sngon po la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúExertion, etc.‚Äù means exertion, blueness, etc.

original: 'dra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rig pa ste /
analyzed: 'dra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rig pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of similarity‚Äù means because of knowledge.

original: blo nyid ni 'dra ba nyi de rig pa'i blo nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: blo nyid ni 'dra ba nyi de rig pa'i blo nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mind itself‚Äù means the similarity of the mind itself.

original: rang la gnas pa nyid ni mi srid pa yin te /
analyzed: rang la gnas pa nyid ni mi srid pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúResiding in itself‚Äù is impossible.

original: rig par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'bad rtsol la sogs pa rnams zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rig par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'bad rtsol la sogs pa rnams zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because there is no cognition.

original: phan tshun rig par byed pa ni bdag nyid la gnas pa ni rig par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phan tshun rig par byed pa ni bdag nyid la gnas pa ni rig par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúExertion, etc.‚Äù means that mutual cognition is not cognition residing in itself.

original: bdag nyid la gnas pas khyad par ni phyi rol las yin gyi blo gzhan las ma yin pa de'i phyir nang gi bdag nyid yin par bstan pa ni bdag la gnas pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid la gnas pas khyad par ni phyi rol las yin gyi blo gzhan las ma yin pa de'i phyir nang gi bdag nyid yin par bstan pa ni bdag la gnas pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The difference is due to its being located in the self, not in another cognition. Therefore, it is taught that it is internal by nature: ‚ÄúIf it were located in the self. ‚Äù

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ni bdag nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //üîΩblo ni bdag la gnas pa nyid @198a * //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ni bdag nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro // blo ni bdag la gnas pa nyid @198a * //
translated: Because there is no difference, because there is the same self.

original: kyis rtogs bzhin pa ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: kyis rtogs bzhin pa ma yin pa ni /
translated: The cognition is not understood by being located in the self.

original: rtogs pa cam las bdag la gnas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa cam las bdag la gnas pa ma yin te /
translated: The mere understanding is not located in the self,

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams la yang khyab pa thal ches pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni bdag ma rtogs par ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams la yang khyab pa thal ches pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni bdag ma rtogs par ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it would follow that there would be an overextension to form, etc. This is taught by ‚ÄúIf the self is not understood. ‚Äù

original: mi byed na byed pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni byed pa po gzhan brtags pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi byed na byed pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni byed pa po gzhan brtags pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not done, it is taught that it is not an action: ‚ÄúBy postulating another agent. ‚Äù

original: byed pa po'i byed pa nyid ni byed pa po gzhan gyis yin pa'i phyir de'i rtog pa yin no zhes zer ba la de dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: byed pa po'i byed pa nyid ni byed pa po gzhan gyis yin pa'i phyir de'i rtog pa yin no zhes zer ba la de dag ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The action of the agent is by another agent. Therefore, it is the postulation of that. This is said by ‚ÄúThose. ‚Äù

original: bdag de yang lus kyi ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag de yang lus kyi ma yin te /
translated: And that self is not of the body,üîΩbecause it is like that.

original: de lta bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúor else‚Äù indicates that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ni lus kyi khongs su gtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ni lus kyi khongs su gtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And for that very reason, because it is included in the body.

original: gzhan du ni lus las phyi rol du gyur pa gzhan gyis ma rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni lus las phyi rol du gyur pa gzhan gyis ma rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that it is not understood to be other than the body, that is, external to the body.

original: 'ga' zhig kyang ni rgyu ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo gzhan la blo gzhan yin no //üîΩblo'i mtshan nyid ni don dang 'dra ba'i don rig pa yin gyi thams cad rang rig pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te blo 'dra zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig kyang ni rgyu ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo gzhan la blo gzhan yin no // blo'i mtshan nyid ni don dang 'dra ba'i don rig pa yin gyi thams cad rang rig pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te blo 'dra zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And it is not the case that the cognition of something else, such as a noncause, is different.üîΩThe definition of cognition is the awareness of an object that resembles it. It is not the case that all cognitions are aware of themselves.üîΩIf you say that cognition resembles its object,

original: blo yang rjes su dpag par bya ba rig pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa 'dra ba ni thal ches par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni da ni 'dra las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: blo yang rjes su dpag par bya ba rig pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa 'dra ba ni thal ches par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni da ni 'dra las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then it follows, absurdly, that cognition is not the nature of that which is to be inferred, awareness.

original: 'dra ba'i blo'i phyogs la thal ches pas 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi don rig pa skye bo thams cad kyi mngon sum yang 'dra ba ma yin pa'i phyir don nyams su myong ba grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to//
analyzed: 'dra ba'i blo'i phyogs la thal ches pas 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi don rig pa skye bo thams cad kyi mngon sum yang 'dra ba ma yin pa'i phyir don nyams su myong ba grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to//
translated: The meaning is that the experience of the object is established because the cognition of similarity is not the only thing that is similar, but the direct perception of all people who know the object is also similar.

original: 'dra ba can ni 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba can ni 'dra ba'o //
translated: Similarity is sameness.

original: 'dzin pa'i byed pas rjes su dpag pa ni rgyu'i blo yin no zhes bya ba khyad par nyid yin par bstan pa ni gal te 'dra ba rnams zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i byed pas rjes su dpag pa ni rgyu'i blo yin no zhes bya ba khyad par nyid yin par bstan pa ni gal te 'dra ba rnams zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The inference through the function of grasping is the cognition of the cause. The difference is shown by the words ‚ÄúIf the cognition of similarity,‚Äù etc.

original: 'dra tsam gyi blo nyid ces bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: 'dra tsam gyi blo nyid ces bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The meaning is that it is the cognition of mere similarity.

original: 'dra ba nyid tsam 'dzin par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid tsam 'dzin par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it grasps mere similarity.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa nyid de'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa nyid de'o //
translated: The same is the function of grasping.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i gzung bar byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i gzung bar byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: How? The meaning is that it is the object of grasping by the eye, etc.

original: rig pa ni 'dra ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa ni khyad par gang las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa ni 'dra ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa ni khyad par gang las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúsimilarity‚Äù is explained in the phrase ‚Äúfrom what particular . . .‚Äù

original: des byas pa zhes bya ba ni blos byas pa'o //
analyzed: des byas pa zhes bya ba ni blos byas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCreated by it‚Äù means created by the mind.

original: blo nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa ni gzugs la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: blo nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa ni gzugs la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mind itself‚Äù means that reflexive awareness would also be the form, etc. This is the meaning.

original: rang rig pa yin na 'dra ba nyid ni nges pa'i don du 'dod pa yin gyi 'dra ba tsam ni ma yin par bstan pa ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa yin na 'dra ba nyid ni nges pa'i don du 'dod pa yin gyi 'dra ba tsam ni ma yin par bstan pa ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there were reflexive awareness, ‚Äúsimilarity‚Äù would be asserted to be definitive, not mere similarity. This is demonstrated in the phrase ‚Äúeven so . . .‚Äù

original: 'dra ba nyid las nges pa rig pa ni rnag rig pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni de'i myong de zhes bya ba ste gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid las nges pa rig pa ni rnag rig pa la yang yin par bstan pa ni de'i myong de zhes bya ba ste gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: The demonstration that the ascertainment from similarity is reflexive awareness is presented in the phrase ‚Äúthe experience of that . . .‚Äù It is not something else.

original: las yin pas lkog tu ma gyur pa'i phyir blo de'i ser po la sogs @198b pa'i rig pa ni mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: las yin pas lkog tu ma gyur pa'i phyir blo de'i ser po la sogs @198b pa'i rig pa ni mngon sum yin no //
translated: Since it is the object, it is not hidden. Therefore the awareness of blue, etc., is direct perception.

original: gzhan du na thams cad med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na thams cad med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Otherwise, everything would be nonexistent. This is the meaning.

original: 'dra ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid tshad ma gang gi yin pa de lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid tshad ma gang gi yin pa de lta bu'o //
translated: The characteristic of similarity is that of which valid cognition is.

original: min zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa las med pa snang bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: min zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa las med pa snang bzhin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot so‚Äù means that, in the absence of self-awareness, there is no appearance.

original: de bstan pa ni mngon du byed na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni mngon du byed na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it were demonstrated‚Äù means if it were made evident.

original: phyi rol ni 'dzin byed dang 'dra ba nyid las gzung ba yin yang 'dzin byed las tha mi dad pa ma yin no zhes zer ba la gal te 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol ni 'dzin byed dang 'dra ba nyid las gzung ba yin yang 'dzin byed las tha mi dad pa ma yin no zhes zer ba la gal te 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe external‚Äù means that, although the object is grasped from similarity to the grasper, it is not non-different from the grasper.üîΩ‚ÄúWhat is the use of saying ‚Äòthis‚Äô?‚Äù

original: skyes pa nyid na rang nyid kyis nyams su myong ba yin na yang ci zhig bya zhes bstan pa ni chus khyer ba la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skyes pa nyid na rang nyid kyis nyams su myong ba yin na yang ci zhig bya zhes bstan pa ni chus khyer ba la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If, when it arises, it is experienced by itself, what is the use of saying ‚Äúthis‚Äù?üîΩ‚ÄúThe purpose‚Äù is taught by the example of the drowning man.

original: nges pas ni phyi rol tu sgro 'dogs na dgos pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni bya ba ste nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: nges pas ni phyi rol tu sgro 'dogs na dgos pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni bya ba ste nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe action‚Äù is the experience.

original: las ni phyi rol gzung ba'o //
analyzed: las ni phyi rol gzung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object‚Äù is the external object.

original: rnam gzhag ni de dag gi nges pa'o //
analyzed: rnam gzhag ni de dag gi nges pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe determination‚Äù is the ascertainment of those.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù means similarity.

original: 'jig rten ni phyi rol rig pa po ste de'i nges pa dang ldan pa la ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni phyi rol rig pa po ste de'i nges pa dang ldan pa la ste /
translated: The world is the external cognizer, and it is determined by that.

original: gzung ba nyid la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i zhen pa tsam gyis ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba nyid la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i zhen pa tsam gyis ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is taught by mere adherence to the world, such as ‚Äúapprehended‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy this‚Äù refers to ‚Äúfrom the similar.‚Äù

original: gal te phyi rol snang ba nyid kyis ci zhig bya 'on te ma yin na de lta na yang ci dgos she na de nyid de ltar zhen pa yin yang ji ltar phyi rol yin zhes bstan pa ni rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ste myong ba
analyzed: gal te phyi rol snang ba nyid kyis ci zhig bya 'on te ma yin na de lta na yang ci dgos she na de nyid de ltar zhen pa yin yang ji ltar phyi rol yin zhes bstan pa ni rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ste myong ba
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is the point of external appearances? If not, then what is the point of that?‚Äù It is explained: ‚ÄúEven though it is adhered to in that way, how is it external?‚Äù

original: de'i ngo bo ni sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rang rig pa de'i rig pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rang rig pa de'i rig pa yin la /
translated: The nature of that is the experience of the nature of blue, etc., which is reflexive awareness.

original: der sgro 'dogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin zhing des 'khrul pa ni gcig tu byed pa ste de'i ngo bo phyi rol yin la /
analyzed: der sgro 'dogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin zhing des 'khrul pa ni gcig tu byed pa ste de'i ngo bo phyi rol yin la /
translated: The superimposition of that is conceptuality, and that causes delusion to be singular. The nature of that is external.

original: de'i rig pa phyi rol pa yin no zhes bya ba ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rig pa phyi rol pa yin no zhes bya ba ni byed pa'o //
translated: The awareness of that is external.

original: de las sngo sogs ni phyi rol la nyams su myong bar tha snyad 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de las sngo sogs ni phyi rol la nyams su myong bar tha snyad 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: But the external blue, etc. is designated as experienced.

original: gzhan gyi bdag nyid ni bdag nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi bdag nyid ni bdag nyid ma yin te /
translated: The other nature is not the nature of that.

original: rig pa ma yin pa ni de yod na yang rig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rig pa ma yin pa ni de yod na yang rig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That which is not cognition does not become cognition even when that exists. This is the meaning.

original: nye bar btags na zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad par byed pa las so //
analyzed: nye bar btags na zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad par byed pa las so //
translated: When it is designated, it is made non-different.

original: gnyi ga mthong ba kha cig tu cung zad nya phyis la dngul bzhin du sgro btags pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gnyi ga mthong ba kha cig tu cung zad nya phyis la dngul bzhin du sgro btags pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not a slight exaggeration to say that both are seen, as if a mother-of-pearl were silver?

original: gang rung gcig mthong ba la ji ltar yin zer ba la gzhan rig na yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang rung gcig mthong ba la ji ltar yin zer ba la gzhan rig na yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: How is it when only one is seen? He says, ‚ÄúEven when the other is cognized.‚Äù

original: phyi rol las rang rig pa yin la de las gzhan pa ni phyi rol lo //
analyzed: phyi rol las rang rig pa yin la de las gzhan pa ni phyi rol lo //
translated: It is self-cognition from the external, and the other is external.

original: gang gi tshe de'i ngo bo rtogs zhes bya ba ni bag chags yongs su smin pa las rtogs par byed pa de'i tshe bdag gis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de'i ngo bo rtogs zhes bya ba ni bag chags yongs su smin pa las rtogs par byed pa de'i tshe bdag gis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: When its nature is realized, when it is made to be realized from the ripening of habitual tendencies, then it is connected with ‚Äúby me.‚Äù

original: tha snyad ni lus dang ngag gi bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: tha snyad ni lus dang ngag gi bdag nyid kyi'o //
translated: Convention is that of the nature of body and speech.

original: rtog pa ji lta ba bzhin du cis mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la blo ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtog pa ji lta ba bzhin du cis mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la blo ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Why is it not so, as it is imagined?

original: phyi rol las bzlog pa ni rig pa yin no zhes @199a * //
analyzed: phyi rol las bzlog pa ni rig pa yin no zhes @199a * //
translated: The mind is the opposite of external.

original: bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni blo rang gi nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni blo rang gi nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the experience of the mind itself.

original: de'i zhes bya ba phyi rol gyi ji ltar yin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba phyi rol gyi ji ltar yin pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIts‚Äù refers to the external, as it is.

original: don myong ba grags pa dang rang rig pa gnyi gar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don myong ba grags pa dang rang rig pa gnyi gar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that both the experience of the object and the self-awareness are non-existent.

original: gcig rig na gzhan mi rig pa des gzung bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni rig par gyur pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig rig na gzhan mi rig pa des gzung bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni rig par gyur pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one is aware of one, one is not aware of the other.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo yin na shes pa nyid dngos por mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo yin na shes pa nyid dngos por mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: If it has such a nature, it is not that consciousness itself does not become an entity.

original: nye bar brten pa dang bral ba'i //
analyzed: nye bar brten pa dang bral ba'i //
translated: Without the support of the object,

original: shes pa cung zad skyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: shes pa cung zad skyed mi 'gyur //
translated: a little consciousness is not produced.

original: zhes zer ba ni rang rig pa tsam ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni rang rig pa tsam ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the statement about mere self-awareness.

original: lan ni gang tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni gang tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is ‚ÄúWhen . . .‚Äù

original: myong ba'i bdag nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa bsgrub pa yin gyi 'dra ba nyid la brten pa ni ma yin gyi 'dra ba nyid la sogs pa de la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: myong ba'i bdag nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa bsgrub pa yin gyi 'dra ba nyid la brten pa ni ma yin gyi 'dra ba nyid la sogs pa de la brten pa yin no //
translated: The nature of experience is established as not being other, but it is not based on mere similarity. It is based on that similarity, etc.

original: rang nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi rgyu mig la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: rang nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi rgyu mig la sogs pa las so //
translated: One's own means from one's own cause, the eye, etc.

original: don la brten pa ma yin zhing de'i 'dra ba la brten pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: don la brten pa ma yin zhing de'i 'dra ba la brten pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not based on the object, nor is it based on its similarity.

original: byed pa ni rang nyid la brten pa yin la /
analyzed: byed pa ni rang nyid la brten pa yin la /
translated: The agent is based on itself,

original: skye ba yang rang gi rgyu mig la brten pa'i phyir don la rag las pa cung zad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skye ba yang rang gi rgyu mig la brten pa'i phyir don la rag las pa cung zad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and arising is based on its own cause, the eye, etc. Therefore, it has no dependence on the object at all. This is the meaning.

original: 'brel ba ni yul can nyid dang ngo //
analyzed: 'brel ba ni yul can nyid dang ngo //
translated: The connection is the object itself.

original: don la shes pa bstan pa yang snal ma rnams la snam bu bzhin du ma yin par bstan pa ni bdag nyid kun gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don la shes pa bstan pa yang snal ma rnams la snam bu bzhin du ma yin par bstan pa ni bdag nyid kun gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that consciousness depends on the object is not like a cloth depending on threads. The phrase by its entire nature shows this.

original: shes bya shes bya ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: shes bya shes bya ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the object of consciousness would become non-existent.

original: zangs gzhong la rgya shug gi 'bras bu bzhin du shes bya des pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zangs gzhong la rgya shug gi 'bras bu bzhin du shes bya des pa ma yin te /
translated: The object of knowledge is not like a jujube fruit in a copper bowl,üîΩbecause it is not of the nature of that.

original: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni mtshungs na ni phye na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni mtshungs na ni phye na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúif it were similar‚Äù is ‚Äúif it were split open.‚Äù

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni rtog pa'i rnam pa la ma reg pas so //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni rtog pa'i rnam pa la ma reg pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù means without touching the aspect of the conception.

original: ci las she na gang las zhes bya ba ste mig las ma mthong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci las she na gang las zhes bya ba ste mig las ma mthong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: From what? From what is called ‚Äúthat,‚Äù because it is not seen from the eye.

original: shes pa ni phyi rol la 'du bas sam phrad pa de la bstan pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i rnam pa can du skyes pas ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /üîΩji ltar sngo sogs ngo bo'i phyir //
analyzed: shes pa ni phyi rol la 'du bas sam phrad pa de la bstan pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i rnam pa can du skyes pas ma yin nam zhes zer ba la / ji ltar sngo sogs ngo bo'i phyir //
translated: It is not taught that consciousness is a meeting or contact with the external, but rather it arises with the aspect of that.üîΩHow is it so?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the nature of blue, etc.

original: nyams su myong ba la yod pa'i sngon po'i ngo bo mthong ba las rten yang nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur gyi phyi rol nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba la yod pa'i sngon po'i ngo bo mthong ba las rten yang nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur gyi phyi rol nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of blue that exists in experience is seen, and the basis also becomes of the nature of experience, not external. The teaching that it is not external is ‚Äúin the same way.‚Äù

original: de yang ste nyams su myong ba'i yang 'brel pa can gyi bskyed bya'o //
analyzed: de yang ste nyams su myong ba'i yang 'brel pa can gyi bskyed bya'o //
translated: And that is the produced which is related to the experience.

original: 'brel par yang don de lta bur go bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'brel par yang don de lta bur go bar bya'o //
translated: And the relation is to be understood in that way.

original: nyams su myong ba dang sngon po la sogs pa yang so so ba nyid du 'jog par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'on te sngon po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang sngon po la sogs pa yang so so ba nyid du 'jog par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'on te sngon po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that the experience and the blue, etc. are posited as distinct, then what is the point of the expression ‚Äúthe experience of blue‚Äù?

original: nye bar gzhag pa @199b min pa ni nye bar 'jog par byed pa min pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar gzhag pa @199b min pa ni nye bar 'jog par byed pa min pa'o //
translated: The non-positing is not the positing.

original: sngon po rtogs pa'i 'bras bu so so ba gcig nyid yin na rgyu tha dad pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la tha dad pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po rtogs pa'i 'bras bu so so ba gcig nyid yin na rgyu tha dad pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la tha dad pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the distinct effect of the cognition of blue is one, how can there be a difference in the cause?

original: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni sngar mthong ba nyid las so //
analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni sngar mthong ba nyid las so //
translated: This very, etc.

original: thams cad du ni rab rib la dang gzhan la yang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad du ni rab rib la dang gzhan la yang ngo //
translated: Everywhere means in the case of the eye disease and in other cases as well.

original: rnam pa zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: Aspect means difference.

original: rab rib bzhin du nye bar 'jog par byed pa dang / gzhan bzhin du yod pa yang ma yin par bstan pa ni 'gal ba ma 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rab rib bzhin du nye bar 'jog par byed pa dang / gzhan bzhin du yod pa yang ma yin par bstan pa ni 'gal ba ma 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is like a cataract, and it is taught that it is not as it is. This is called ‚Äúnon-erroneous contradiction.‚Äù

original: mthong ba snga ma zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid ni mi dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba snga ma zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid ni mi dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The previous seeing is not a memory, and it does not posit a direct perception.

original: bstan pa ni don ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bstan pa ni don ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching is about the meaning.

original: nges pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i byed pa can gyi mthong ba ni phyi rol rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: nges pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i byed pa can gyi mthong ba ni phyi rol rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is the seeing that has the activity of following the ascertainment not what posits the external?

original: nyams su myong ba ma yin no zhes zer ba la ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ma yin no zhes zer ba la ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not an experience.

original: de'i nyams su myong ba ma nges par nyams su myong ngo zhes bya ba ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de'i nyams su myong ba ma nges par nyams su myong ngo zhes bya ba ji ltar yin /
translated: How can it be said that the experience of that is not ascertained?

original: don bzhin du ni zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pas skyon med do zhes bya ba nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi don la'o //
analyzed: don bzhin du ni zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pas skyon med do zhes bya ba nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi don la'o //
translated: As it is with the meaning, the fault is not the same, as it is with the dissimilar example. It is with regard to the meaning that has the nature of experience.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: That is the ascertainment.

original: don la 'ang rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rta la rtogs par byed pa na yang ba lang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la 'ang rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rta la rtogs par byed pa na yang ba lang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In fact, ‚Äúalways‚Äù means that when one is perceiving a horse, one also sees a cow.

original: 'di res 'ga' mthong ba yin pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid la yang yod do zhes bya bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di res 'ga' mthong ba yin pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid la yang yod do zhes bya bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since this is sometimes seen, it is experienced as having the nature of experience.

original: de bzhin du nyams su myong ba'i nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyams su myong ba'i nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the same way, experience is the experience of experience.

original: de ni rtag tu med pa'i don bshad pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni rtag tu med pa'i don bshad pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the meaning of ‚Äúnever‚Äù is ‚Äúor else.‚Äù

original: de las zhes bya ba ni nges pa nyid ma yin pa las te zhes pa las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni nges pa nyid ma yin pa las te zhes pa las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù means from the very absence of certainty.

original: de kho na rnam par gnas pa ni tha dad pa'i phyir rol rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na rnam par gnas pa ni tha dad pa'i phyir rol rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: The establishment of reality is the establishment of difference.

original: nyams su myong ba tsam las nges pa'i don bzhin nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid la yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni ldog pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba tsam las nges pa'i don bzhin nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid la yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni ldog pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that the meaning of certainty is like experience, from mere experience, is ‚Äújust the reversal.‚Äù

original: gsal bar nyams su myong ba ni sngon po'i yin gyi nyams su myong ba'i ma yin par bstan pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal bar nyams su myong ba ni sngon po'i yin gyi nyams su myong ba'i ma yin par bstan pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the experience of the manifestation of blue is of blue, not of the experience, is also indicated by the word ‚Äúagain.‚Äù

original: dkar po la sogs pa mngon par gsal ba'i ngo bo snang ba ni mngon sum gsal ba nyid de nges par nus pa nyid do //
analyzed: dkar po la sogs pa mngon par gsal ba'i ngo bo snang ba ni mngon sum gsal ba nyid de nges par nus pa nyid do //
translated: The appearance of the nature of the manifestation of white, etc., is the manifestation of the perception, which is the capacity for ascertainment.

original: der mngon par gsal ba las gsal ba'i ngo bo gzhan gyi dngos po ste tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: der mngon par gsal ba las gsal ba'i ngo bo gzhan gyi dngos po ste tha dad pa'o //
translated: The nature of the manifestation of that is the nature of another entity, i.e., it is different.

original: bdag tu gyur pa'i ngo bo'i mngon par gsal ba las tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag tu gyur pa'i ngo bo'i mngon par gsal ba las tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not different from the manifestation of the nature of the self, i.e., it is the same.

original: mngon par gsal ba gang gi yin pa de'i gzhan dngos te snang ba yin na'o //
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba gang gi yin pa de'i gzhan dngos te snang ba yin na'o //
translated: If it is the manifestation of that, then the nature of another entity, i.e., the appearance, is of that.

original: gsal mi na ni ma dmigs pa na'o //
analyzed: gsal mi na ni ma dmigs pa na'o //
translated: If it is not manifest, it is not perceived.

original: ji ltar @200a * //üîΩni zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar @200a * // ni zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: How?üîΩThe word ‚Äúna‚Äù means ‚Äúnot.‚Äù

original: gsal ba ni ma dmigs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsal ba ni ma dmigs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the manifestation is not perceived.

original: mi gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa ni dngos po cung zad kyang gsal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni mngon par gsal ba ma yin pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa ni dngos po cung zad kyang gsal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni mngon par gsal ba ma yin pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of the unclear is taught to be the non-clarity of any entity whatsoever, and that is not manifest.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo'i gsal bas dkar po gsal bar byas pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni de mngon par gsal ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo'i gsal bas dkar po gsal bar byas pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni de mngon par gsal ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Is the nature of the hidden consciousness not clarified by the clarity of the unclear? That is unreasonable, and it is taught: ‚ÄúThat is not manifest.‚Äù

original: rig par byas pa ni mngon par gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rig par byas pa ni mngon par gsal ba'o //
translated: That which is made known is manifest.

original: de nyid ni mngon sum yin te gzhan ma yin pa ni mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mngon sum yin te gzhan ma yin pa ni mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
translated: That itself is direct perception, and that which is not other is not direct perception.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni de mi skye ba'i gnas skabs su khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni de mi skye ba'i gnas skabs su khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How? Because there is no difference in the state of non-arising.

original: las kyi ngo bo ni khyad par nyid yin la de yang khyad par med par ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la 'di ci zhig ces bya ba ste rang rig pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi ngo bo ni khyad par nyid yin la de yang khyad par med par ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la 'di ci zhig ces bya ba ste rang rig pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The nature of action is difference itself, and how can that be without difference? What is this? It is not self-awareness.

original: lhag pa dang thug pa med pa dang rtogs pa med par yang byed pa yin par bstan pa ni de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhag pa dang thug pa med pa dang rtogs pa med par yang byed pa yin par bstan pa ni de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is also the agent of the non-apprehension, the non-contact, and the non-realization is ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: ma rtogs pa nye bar bsdu ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa nye bar bsdu ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The summary of the non-apprehension is ‚Äútherefore.‚Äù

original: gsal min ni rtogs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gsal min ni rtogs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The non-clarity is the non-realization.

original: gzhan ni rang gi khyad par las so //
analyzed: gzhan ni rang gi khyad par las so //
translated: The other is from its own particular.

original: de lta bu nyid ni shes pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid ni shes pa nyid kyis so //
translated: That itself is by the cognition itself.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni shes pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúthis‚Äù is the cognition.

original: mi gsal ba nyid dang bden pa pa dang / lkog tu gyur pa dang / bems po ste phyi rol mi gsal ba yin na gsal bas gsal bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: mi gsal ba nyid dang bden pa pa dang / lkog tu gyur pa dang / bems po ste phyi rol mi gsal ba yin na gsal bas gsal bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: If the external is not clear, not true, hidden, and inert, it is not clear by the clear.üîΩThe clarity of that is from that other than it, but it is not from itself.

original: de'i gsal ba ni de las gzhan pas yin gyi rang las ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la gsal ba zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i gsal ba ni de las gzhan pas yin gyi rang las ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la gsal ba zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thinking that, he says, ‚Äúthe clarity.‚Äù

original: gsal ba'i gsal ba ni gsal ba nyid de dkar po la sogs pa'i gsal ba yang yin pa'i phyir gsal ba gzhan la thug pa med pas thams cad mi gsal ba'i skyon yin no zhes bya ba'i don to//
analyzed: gsal ba'i gsal ba ni gsal ba nyid de dkar po la sogs pa'i gsal ba yang yin pa'i phyir gsal ba gzhan la thug pa med pas thams cad mi gsal ba'i skyon yin no zhes bya ba'i don to//
translated: The clarity of clarity is clarity itself, because it is the clarity of white, etc. Therefore, since there is no other clarity, the error arises that everything is not clear.

original: shes pas gsal ba gsal ba'i phyir gsal ba gzhan gyis rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la thug pa med par 'grel pas bstan pa ni gang gis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: shes pas gsal ba gsal ba'i phyir gsal ba gzhan gyis rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la thug pa med par 'grel pas bstan pa ni gang gis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The Autocommentary states that since consciousness is clear, it is clear by itself, and that it is cognized by another clarity.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i shes pas gsal ba nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i shes pas gsal ba nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: The clarity of consciousness apprehends clarity itself.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid yin gyis shes pas ni ma yin no /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid yin gyis shes pas ni ma yin no /
translated: Its own nature means that it is itself, not consciousness.

original: gsal ba snga mas zhes bya ba ni dkar po rtogs pas so //
analyzed: gsal ba snga mas zhes bya ba ni dkar po rtogs pas so //
translated: The former clarity means the apprehension of white.

original: de'i yang zhes bya ba ni dkar por gsal ba'i shes pa gsal ba nyid 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yang zhes bya ba ni dkar por gsal ba'i shes pa gsal ba nyid 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The clarity of the consciousness that is clear as white apprehends clarity itself.

original: gzhan gyis ni shes pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni shes pas so //
translated: The other means consciousness.

original: dkar po'i gsal ba ni dkar po ma yin pa'i gsal ba bzhin du gsal ba de rtogs par mi 'gyur bar 'phen pa yin na thug pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: dkar po'i gsal ba ni dkar po ma yin pa'i gsal ba bzhin du gsal ba de rtogs par mi 'gyur bar 'phen pa yin na thug pa med pa yin no //
translated: If it is claimed that the manifestation of white is not manifested by the manifestation of white, but rather by the manifestation of something else, then there would be an infinite regress.

original: @200b gsal ba ni rang nyid dam gsal ba gzhan gyis kyang gsal bar byed la /
analyzed: @200b gsal ba ni rang nyid dam gsal ba gzhan gyis kyang gsal bar byed la /
translated: A manifestation manifests itself or it manifests another.

original: de lta yin na ni dkar po la sogs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la mthong dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni dkar po la sogs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la mthong dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that were so, would not white, etc., be manifested?

original: gsal bas gsal ba'i shes pa yin na ni de dang 'brel pa'i shes pas 'brel pa rtogs pa ma yin pa dkar po la sogs pa gang gi yin pa'i 'brel pa can gyi shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'brel pa'i shes pa nyid khyad par gyi
analyzed: gsal bas gsal ba'i shes pa yin na ni de dang 'brel pa'i shes pas 'brel pa rtogs pa ma yin pa dkar po la sogs pa gang gi yin pa'i 'brel pa can gyi shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'brel pa'i shes pa nyid khyad par gyi
translated: If it is a cognition of a manifestation, then the cognition that is related to it does not cognize the relation, because the cognition of the relation is preceded by the cognition of the related object, such as white, etc.

original: shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The cognition of the relation is the cognition of the qualifier.üîΩIf the relation were not like that, etc.

original: 'brel par ni de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs pa la yod par snang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'brel par ni de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs pa la yod par snang ba yin no //
translated: The appearance in cognition is as if it existed.

original: khyad par gzung ba nyid las zhes bya ba ni khyad par can bzung ba nyid las so //
analyzed: khyad par gzung ba nyid las zhes bya ba ni khyad par can bzung ba nyid las so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn particular, from the object itself‚Äù means from the particular object itself.

original: gzhan gyi bdag nyid nyams myong med //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bdag nyid nyams myong med //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no experience of another‚Äôs nature‚Äù

original: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'i grub mtha' yin no zhes zer ba khyed kyi ltar na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'i grub mtha' yin no zhes zer ba khyed kyi ltar na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: means that this is the Buddhist tenet.

original: bstan zin pas zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: bstan zin pas zhes bya ba ni //
translated: ‚ÄúSince it has already been explained‚Äù

original: rang gi ngo bo'i rang bzhin de'i //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo'i rang bzhin de'i //
translated: means that the nature of the object

original: myong ba sgro 'dogs 'khrul pa las //
analyzed: myong ba sgro 'dogs 'khrul pa las //
translated: is experienced through the elimination of superimpositions.

original: sdo sogs myang bar grags yin gyi //üîΩgzhan gyi bdag nyid myong las min //
analyzed: sdo sogs myang bar grags yin gyi // gzhan gyi bdag nyid myong las min //
translated: ‚ÄúThe experience of blue and so on is renowned‚Äù

original: zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya bas so //
translated: means that it is not from the experience of another‚Äôs nature.

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi 'dod pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù means in your assertion.üîΩ‚ÄúIn your assertion, there is no particularity‚Äù means that it is not so.

original: khyed kyi 'dod pa la khyad par can ma yin pa nyid ces ma yin zhes zer ba la gang phyir gnyis las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyed kyi 'dod pa la khyad par can ma yin pa nyid ces ma yin zhes zer ba la gang phyir gnyis las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the two‚Äù is the response.

original: kho bo cag gi shes pa gcig nyid shes pa gnyis yin pa bzhin du khyod kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag gi shes pa gcig nyid shes pa gnyis yin pa bzhin du khyod kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor us, a single consciousness is two consciousnesses, but for you it is not,‚Äù is the response of the Jaina.

original: 'grel par ni shes pa re re nyid yin gyi gnyis ma yin par bshad pa ni don rtogs pa'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'grel par ni shes pa re re nyid yin gyi gnyis ma yin par bshad pa ni don rtogs pa'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary explains that it is each individual cognition, not two, when it says ‚Äúat the time of understanding the object.‚Äù

original: nges pa las kyang gcig rtogs na gnyis ka rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni gnyis dag 'brel par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa las kyang gcig rtogs na gnyis ka rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni gnyis dag 'brel par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Also, the NyƒÅyamukha teaches that if one is understood, both are understood, when it says, ‚ÄúThe two are related.‚Äù

original: 'grel pa ni 'di rang gi 'dod pa ma yin zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'grel pa ni 'di rang gi 'dod pa ma yin zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The commentary says, ‚ÄúThis is not our own position.‚Äù

original: khyed kyi 'dod pas zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: khyed kyi 'dod pas zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: This is because of the words ‚Äúaccording to your assertion.‚Äù

original: nged kyi ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rtogs pa don yin te /
analyzed: nged kyi ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rtogs pa don yin te /
translated: Also, the words ‚Äúaccording to us‚Äù and so on are understood.

original: ji ltar mthong ba yin zhes nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba yin zhes nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is certain that it is what is seen.

original: don zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: don zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Object‚Äù means not a state.

original: don rtogs pa ni de nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: don rtogs pa ni de nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Understanding the object‚Äù means experiencing it.

original: don gyi ngo bo shes pa yin pa'i phyogs la gnyi ga 'brel pa can nyid yin yang de'i shes pa ni shes pa gzhan gyis yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no snyam du sems pa ni gang gi mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bo shes pa yin pa'i phyogs la gnyi ga 'brel pa can nyid yin yang de'i shes pa ni shes pa gzhan gyis yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no snyam du sems pa ni gang gi mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the position that the nature of the object is consciousness, although both are related, the consciousness of that is by another consciousness. This is the difference. This is what is thought in ‚Äúthat seeing.‚Äù

original: gang gi zhes bya ba ni rgol ba gang gi 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: gang gi zhes bya ba ni rgol ba gang gi 'dod pa la'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the opponent‚Äôs assertion.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa la'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that‚Äù refers to the assertion.

original: mthong zhes brjod ces bya ba ni @201a * //
analyzed: mthong zhes brjod ces bya ba ni @201a * //
translated: ‚Äú Is said to see‚Äù is a definite

original: nges pas te mthong ngo zhes bya ba yin gyi rang rig pa dang 'brel pa'i zhes pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pas te mthong ngo zhes bya ba yin gyi rang rig pa dang 'brel pa'i zhes pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is ‚Äúsees,‚Äù not because it is related to reflexive awareness.

original: 'grel par ni khyad par la sogs pa nyid rang gi rig pa grub pa ma yin par bstan pa yin no //üîΩ'dra ba mthong ba 'dzin pa de lta na rang nyid rig pa yin gyi gzhan du na thams cad mi dmigs par thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'grel par ni khyad par la sogs pa nyid rang gi rig pa grub pa ma yin par bstan pa yin no // 'dra ba mthong ba 'dzin pa de lta na rang nyid rig pa yin gyi gzhan du na thams cad mi dmigs par thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: In the Commentary, the very distinctions are shown to be not established as reflexive awareness.

original: rang rig grub ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig grub ces bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that if the seeing of the similar is the apprehender, then it is reflexive awareness, but otherwise it would follow that nothing could be observed, is stated in the line ‚ÄúReflexive awareness is established.‚Äù

original: 'di'i ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: This is the other's.

original: gang la zhe na 'dra ba nyid la ste 'dra ba mthong ba'i 'dra ba nyid la'o //üîΩ'grel par ni khyad par la sogs pa nyid dngos su ma yin pa'i phyir der zhen pa can gyi bdag nyid kyi rig pa la don med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i lan gyi don bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang la zhe na 'dra ba nyid la ste 'dra ba mthong ba'i 'dra ba nyid la'o // 'grel par ni khyad par la sogs pa nyid dngos su ma yin pa'i phyir der zhen pa can gyi bdag nyid kyi rig pa la don med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i lan gyi don bstan pa ni /
translated: Where? In similarity itself, in the similarity that is seen.

original: khyad par dang ni khyad par can //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par dang ni khyad par can // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the commentary, the meaning of the reply, Because the difference, etc. itself is not actually, the cognition of the nature of that which is conceived is meaningless, is taught by The difference and the different, etc.

original: khyad par dang zhes bya ba ni don de lta bu'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par dang zhes bya ba ni don de lta bu'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The difference is because the nature of that object is not like that.

original: shes pa mi rig na shes bya yang mi rig pa yin te rtogs pa nyid rig pa yin na yang rang gi rig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa mi rig na shes bya yang mi rig pa yin te rtogs pa nyid rig pa yin na yang rang gi rig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: If cognition does not cognize itself, the object of cognition is also not cognized. If understanding itself is cognition, it follows that it cognizes itself. This is taught by

original: nyams myong ma lus ldog par 'gyur //
analyzed: nyams myong ma lus ldog par 'gyur //
translated: All experience would be reversed.

original: zhes bya ba nyid kyis /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nyid kyis /
translated: This is taught by

original: 'gro ba ma lus gsal ma yin //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus gsal ma yin //
translated: All beings would not be illuminated.

original: zhes bya ba bzhin du dran par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bzhin du dran par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the one who is victorious.

original: khyad par bdag nyid gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'grel par te de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par bdag nyid gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'grel par te de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary says, ‚ÄúBecause it is impossible for another to have the nature of being different,‚Äù and that is the ‚Äúother.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyis rang gi ngo bo gzung ba'i khyad par nyid la sogs pa phyis gzhan gyis shes par bshad nas /
analyzed: gzhan gyis rang gi ngo bo gzung ba'i khyad par nyid la sogs pa phyis gzhan gyis shes par bshad nas /
translated: After explaining that the specific object grasped by one consciousness is later grasped by another consciousness,üîΩit says, ‚ÄúIf the former is not the object of the latter, how could the latter be the grasper of the former as it is?‚Äù

original: snga ma de'i yul ma yin na de'i phyi ma de'i yul du ji ltar de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur zhes bya ba med pas de'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o zhes bya bas /üîΩgang gi mthong ba 'dra ba ni //
analyzed: snga ma de'i yul ma yin na de'i phyi ma de'i yul du ji ltar de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur zhes bya ba med pas de'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o zhes bya bas / gang gi mthong ba 'dra ba ni //
translated: Therefore it is not its nature.üîΩThis explains the line:

original: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf the seeing is the same . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe explanation of the line ‚ÄúIf there is no self-awareness . . .‚Äù

original: rang rig grub ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni /üîΩdang po khyad par mthong ba med //
analyzed: rang rig grub ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni / dang po khyad par mthong ba med //
translated: The explanation of the statement ‚ÄúOne‚Äôs own self-awareness is established‚Äù is as follows.üîΩFirst, there is no seeing of difference.üîΩ

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFirst there is no seeing of the difference . . .‚Äù

original: dran pas phan btags pa'i dbang po ni de nyid kyi tshe de rig pa yin gyi sngar ni ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni 'on te phyis zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dran pas phan btags pa'i dbang po ni de nyid kyi tshe de rig pa yin gyi sngar ni ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni 'on te phyis zhes pa'o //
translated: The sense faculty that is helped by memory is aware of that at that time, but not previously.

original: phan ma btags pa'i gzung ba ji ltar phan btags pa yod na gzhan du 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phan ma btags pa'i gzung ba ji ltar phan btags pa yod na gzhan du 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: How can an object that is not helped be different when it is helped?

original: de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba ste khyad par ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba ste khyad par ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is not the nature of that, i.e., it is not a particular.

original: khyad par can nyid ni lhag pa nyid yin te de'i yul ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir de nyid gzhan du 'dzin pa la rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par can nyid ni lhag pa nyid yin te de'i yul ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir de nyid gzhan du 'dzin pa la rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The particular is the excess, because it would not be the object of that, since it is not independent in the apprehension of that as different.

original: nya phyis la dngul lo zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni de ltar yin par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul lo zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni de ltar yin par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the mother-of-pearl is silver is an error.

original: gang yin zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa la yang @201b gzhan du rig par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yin zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa la yang @201b gzhan du rig par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is it? It is the cause of error, because it is known as different from that.

original: drug ldan la sogs pa sngar ma rtogs pa'i phyis rtogs pa nyid yod pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te sngar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: drug ldan la sogs pa sngar ma rtogs pa'i phyis rtogs pa nyid yod pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te sngar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But isn't it the case that the six-factored one and so on are not previously understood and are later understood? To this he says, If it is said that it is previously...

original: khyad par zhes bya ba ni khyad par la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba ni khyad par la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The distinction is the nature of the distinction and so on.

original: thos pa goms pa yin na drug ldan la sogs pa yin gyi khyad par nyid las dbang po'i yul ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thos pa goms pa yin na drug ldan la sogs pa yin gyi khyad par nyid las dbang po'i yul ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is familiarity with what is heard, it is the six-factored one and so on. To show that the distinction itself is not an object of the sense faculties, he says, If it is said that it is a distinction...

original: rtogs mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni goms pa dang gzhan du yang tshad mas mi rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni goms pa dang gzhan du yang tshad mas mi rtogs pa'o //
translated: It is not understood means that it is not understood by valid cognition, either through familiarity or otherwise.

original: tshad mas mi rtogs pa nyid bstan pa ni rtag tu 'ba' zhig pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad mas mi rtogs pa nyid bstan pa ni rtag tu 'ba' zhig pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To show that it is not understood by valid cognition, he says, It is always only...

original: rtag tu ni goms pa dang gzhan du yang gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: rtag tu ni goms pa dang gzhan du yang gzhan gyis so //
translated: Always means that it is not understood by others, either through familiarity or otherwise.

original: rang nyid kyis 'dra ba nyid kho nar ci'i phyir rig pa ma yin zhes zer ba la 'dra ba las ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis 'dra ba nyid kho nar ci'i phyir rig pa ma yin zhes zer ba la 'dra ba las ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Why is it not known by oneself alone in just the same way? To this he says, From similarity...

original: sngar nyid ces bya ba ni 'dra ba thams cad phan tshun du myong ba nyid ni thob par 'gyur zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: sngar nyid ces bya ba ni 'dra ba thams cad phan tshun du myong ba nyid ni thob par 'gyur zhes bya bar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPreviously‚Äù means that all similarities would be mutually experienced.

original: rang rig pa ma yin pa la 'dra ba nyid med do zhes bya ba yang gnyi ga rig pa yin pa las bstan pa ni mthong ba dag nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa ma yin pa la 'dra ba nyid med do zhes bya ba yang gnyi ga rig pa yin pa las bstan pa ni mthong ba dag nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout self-awareness, there is no similarity‚Äù also shows that both are awareness. ‚ÄúSeeing‚Äù means seeing itself.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni don no //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni don no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the object.

original: de ni 'di ni 'dra ba'o zhes bya bas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ni 'dra ba'o zhes bya bas bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat is similar‚Äù shows that.

original: gzhan gyis rig pa ma yin te thug pa med pa'i phyir dang / rang nyid kyis kyang ma yin te khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rig pa ma yin te thug pa med pa'i phyir dang / rang nyid kyis kyang ma yin te khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not known by another, because that would lead to an infinite regress, and it is not known by itself, because that is not accepted.

original: don rig pa ma yin pa las kyang 'dra ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'gro ba ma lus pa sems pa can ma yin pa thob par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni 'dra ba nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don rig pa ma yin pa las kyang 'dra ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'gro ba ma lus pa sems pa can ma yin pa thob par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni 'dra ba nyid kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven similarity is not from an object that is not known,‚Äù shows that all beings would not be sentient, because there would be no similarity.

original: gnyis ka yang yin la mthong ba yang yin pa de med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang yin la mthong ba yang yin pa de med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBoth‚Äù means both the object and the subject. ‚ÄúSeeing‚Äù means seeing itself. ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means that object. ‚ÄúThat is similar‚Äù shows that.

original: de dang de nyid bshad pa ni de tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang de nyid bshad pa ni de tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that and that is ‚Äúat that time.‚Äù

original: shes pa zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan gyis mi rig pas so //
analyzed: shes pa zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan gyis mi rig pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúConsciousness‚Äù is not known by itself or by another.

original: 'ba' zhig mthong la ni don ma mthong ba na'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig mthong la ni don ma mthong ba na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOnly‚Äù means not seeing the object.

original: mthong ba ni don gyis byas pa'i rnam pa can ni sgro 'dogs pa po'i don rang gi dus na rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa la rnam pa rang gi dus kyi don la ma nges pa yin par bstan pa ni 'das pa
analyzed: mthong ba ni don gyis byas pa'i rnam pa can ni sgro 'dogs pa po'i don rang gi dus na rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa la rnam pa rang gi dus kyi don la ma nges pa yin par bstan pa ni 'das pa
translated: ‚ÄúSeeing‚Äù is the form of the object that is made. The one who superimposes thinks that the object is established at its own time. The form is not ascertained in the object at its own time.

original: dang zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dang zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPast‚Äù and so on.

original: don dang don gyis mthong ba yang de dag gi'o //
analyzed: don dang don gyis mthong ba yang de dag gi'o //
translated: The seeing of the object and the object is theirs.

original: de khong nas dbyung ba yin na yang zhes bya ba ni lhan cig yod par rtog pa na'o //
analyzed: de khong nas dbyung ba yin na yang zhes bya ba ni lhan cig yod par rtog pa na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven though it is drawn out from within‚Äù means when it is conceived to exist simultaneously.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid ces bya ba ni don de la rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid ces bya ba ni don de la rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúConsciousness itself‚Äù is because it engages with that object.

original: shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ma yin pa nyid ni rang nyid rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir don nyid yin la ma rig pa dang mthun pa med pa yang mi mthun par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni phyis kyi @202a * //
analyzed: shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ma yin pa nyid ni rang nyid rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir don nyid yin la ma rig pa dang mthun pa med pa yang mi mthun par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni phyis kyi @202a * //
translated: It is not a subsequent cognition because it is not self-aware. It is an object. It is taught that the absence of conformity with non-awareness also makes it non-conforming.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated later.

original: der sgro 'dogs pa ni don du sgro 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: der sgro 'dogs pa ni don du sgro 'dogs pa'o //
translated: There, superimposition is superimposition onto an object.

original: mi srid pa'i phyir ni 'dra ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir ni 'dra ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible, because there is no similarity.

original: phyis zhes bya ba ni mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i rtog pas so //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba ni mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i rtog pas so //
translated: Later means by the conception I saw.

original: mi 'dra bas ni khyad par nyid la sogs pas so //
analyzed: mi 'dra bas ni khyad par nyid la sogs pas so //
translated: By dissimilarity means by difference, etc.

original: phyis mthong bas khyad par med pa la sogs pa mthong ba na snga ma ni mthong ba'i dus yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyis mthong bas khyad par med pa la sogs pa mthong ba na snga ma ni mthong ba'i dus yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Later, when seeing without difference, etc., because the previous time was the time of seeing,

original: rang dbang ma yin par bstan pa ni rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang dbang ma yin par bstan pa ni rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is taught that it is not independent. By its own nature means by its own nature.

original: kha rog 'dug pa ni sems pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha rog 'dug pa ni sems pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Remaining silent means because it is without thought.

original: ka ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba ma yin nam zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: ka ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba ma yin nam zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPillar‚Äù and so on is connected with ‚Äúis not seen.‚Äù

original: mthong ba mi 'thad pa ma yin pa'i lan ni 'gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba mi 'thad pa ma yin pa'i lan ni 'gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the objection that seeing is not tenable is ‚ÄúThere is a contradiction.‚Äù

original: rang gi ngo bos ni rang nyid kyis te de gal te rang bzhin gzhan yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni rang nyid kyis te de gal te rang bzhin gzhan yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBy its own nature‚Äù means by itself. ‚ÄúIf that is a different nature‚Äù is connected.

original: de zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'i mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma dmigs pa na'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'i mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma dmigs pa na'o //
