analyzed: de lam gtogs pa de'i rten mthong ba'i phyir bdag go zhes bya ba yang goms pa las byung ba yin gyi nges pa'i yul can ma yin no //
translated: The self is the support of the path and the one who sees, but this is not a definite object, but rather one that arises from habit.

original: 'dod pa nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa bskyed pa'i bag chags la brten pa'i rnam shes mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa bskyed pa'i bag chags la brten pa'i rnam shes mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The object of desire is consciousness, because consciousness is seen to be based on the latent impressions that produce consciousness.

original: shes pa las shes pa yin par ni bden te shes pa nyid kyi 'pho ba ni shes pa bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba la gzung la gzung nyid ces bya ste /
analyzed: shes pa las shes pa yin par ni bden te shes pa nyid kyi 'pho ba ni shes pa bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba la gzung la gzung nyid ces bya ste /
translated: It is true that consciousness is produced from consciousness, but the transference of consciousness itself is not the apprehender, like consciousness.

original: @218b bskyed bya nyid kho na 'dzin par byed pa nyid ni yul la bzhin du shes pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: @218b bskyed bya nyid kho na 'dzin par byed pa nyid ni yul la bzhin du shes pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúthe object of desire‚Äù is that the object of desire is the one who is produced, and the apprehender is the one who is produced.üîΩThe object of desire is the one who is produced, and the apprehender is the one who is produced, just as the object is the one who is produced and the consciousness is the apprehender.

original: yul dang bcas pa'i shes pa'i bskyed bya nyid ni 'pho ba yin la /
analyzed: yul dang bcas pa'i shes pa'i bskyed bya nyid ni 'pho ba yin la /
translated: The transference of consciousness is the one who is produced by consciousness that has an object.

original: shes pa tsam du bskyed par bya ba nyid ni yin no zhes zer ba la skyed byed nyid ces bya ba ste gnyi ga skyed par byed pa'i phyir gnyi ga 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa tsam du bskyed par bya ba nyid ni yin no zhes zer ba la skyed byed nyid ces bya ba ste gnyi ga skyed par byed pa'i phyir gnyi ga 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit is the producer‚Äù is that it is the apprehender of both, because it produces both.üîΩIsn‚Äôt the producer not an object of the sense faculties?

original: skyed par byed pa yang dbang po gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la snang ba gzung min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa yang dbang po gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la snang ba gzung min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAppearance is not an object.‚Äù

original: snang ba zhes bya ba ni gsal ba yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba ni gsal ba yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúAppearance‚Äù means clarity, not a sense faculty.

original: gsal ba ni phra ba nyid kyis bar du chod pas shin tu nye ba'i phyir brkyang ba'am brdabs pa'i phyir gzung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba la cha med pa la'ang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsal ba ni phra ba nyid kyis bar du chod pas shin tu nye ba'i phyir brkyang ba'am brdabs pa'i phyir gzung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba la cha med pa la'ang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe subtle‚Äù means that because clarity is subtle, it is not an object of the sense faculties, because it is very close, or because it is hidden or concealed.

original: cha med pa ni yan lag med pa ste rig pa'i bdag nyid la snang ba 'dzin pa na gzugs nyid 'dzin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cha med pa ni yan lag med pa ste rig pa'i bdag nyid la snang ba 'dzin pa na gzugs nyid 'dzin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúEven in the partless‚Äù means that the partless is without parts. The meaning is that when the nature of consciousness apprehends an appearance, it does not apprehend form.

original: nam yang ni phra ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: nam yang ni phra ba la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúNever‚Äù means by subtle particles and so on.

original: dub pa'i snga rol du bskyed pa ni gzung ba nyid yin gyi phyis ni skyed par byed pa nyid yin no snyam du sems pa ni gzung ba'i zhes bya ba ste 'pho ba'i dus na'o //
analyzed: dub pa'i snga rol du bskyed pa ni gzung ba nyid yin gyi phyis ni skyed par byed pa nyid yin no snyam du sems pa ni gzung ba'i zhes bya ba ste 'pho ba'i dus na'o //
translated: The thought is that prior to exhaustion, the condition of being apprehended exists, but later, the condition of being a generator does not exist.üîΩThe condition of being a generator and the condition of being a self are not impaired.

original: skyed par byed pa yang yin la bdag nyid kyang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyams pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa yang yin la bdag nyid kyang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyams pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: The Autocommentary states:

original: 'grel par yang nus pa gnyis yin te /
analyzed: 'grel par yang nus pa gnyis yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThere are two kinds of capacity.

original: de ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: That is illogical.‚ÄùüîΩThe thought is that just as a lamp and so on are not illuminated, they would not be apprehended.

original: mar me la sogs pa gsal ba'i mi gsal ba nyid bzhin du gzung bar bya ba nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la gzung ba'i nus pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa gsal ba'i mi gsal ba nyid bzhin du gzung bar bya ba nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la gzung ba'i nus pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The condition of being apprehended is not impaired.

original: gsal bar bya ba nyid ma yin yang gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa las gzhan pa ste skyed pa'i bdag nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba nyid ma yin yang gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa las gzhan pa ste skyed pa'i bdag nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa ste /
translated: Just as form and so on are apprehended even though they are not illuminated, it is not the case that they are different from the apprehender, that is, the generator, and they are not different from the self.

original: skyed pa ma yin pa yang las ma yin pas 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: skyed pa ma yin pa yang las ma yin pas 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: and that which is not produced is not karma, because there is no connection.üîΩThis is the position of the Jains.

original: gsal ba las bzhin du gzung ba nyid yin la 'di las kyang skyed pa gzhan yin no zhes zer ba la gzung ba zhes bya ba ste gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin yang gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba las bzhin du gzung ba nyid yin la 'di las kyang skyed pa gzhan yin no zhes zer ba la gzung ba zhes bya ba ste gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin yang gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
translated: If it is said that like a manifest entity, it is apprehended, but it is produced from something else, then it is not an object of apprehension, because it is not manifest.üîΩIt is not tenable to say that it is produced from something else, and that is not a seed, etc.

original: 'di las gzhan du skye ba ma yin zhing de yang sa bon la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni gzung ba'i mtshan nyid can la zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs pa yin gyi byed pa po'i mtshan nyid la ni ma
analyzed: 'di las gzhan du skye ba ma yin zhing de yang sa bon la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni gzung ba'i mtshan nyid can la zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs pa yin gyi byed pa po'i mtshan nyid la ni ma
translated: The characteristic of an object of apprehension is a state, not the characteristic of an agent.

original: yin no // de la ni @219a * //üîΩgzung ba nyid las gzhan pa yang skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: yin no // de la ni @219a * // gzung ba nyid las gzhan pa yang skyed pa yin no //
translated: In that case,üîΩproduction from something other than an object of apprehension is not tenable.

original: dngos su zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba skyed pa gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: dngos su zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba skyed pa gzhan nyid do //
translated: Directly means that it is produced from something else that is to be inferred.

original: gzhan du dmigs pa'i rkyen nyid yin par te rkyen nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gzhan du min par ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du dmigs pa'i rkyen nyid yin par te rkyen nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gzhan du min par ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it would not be a condition in any other way.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that a condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.

original: phan 'dogs zhes bya ba nyid ni rkyen yin te phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa gzhan du ste gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyis so //üîΩskyed par byed pa ni gzung ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: phan 'dogs zhes bya ba nyid ni rkyen yin te phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa gzhan du ste gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyis so // skyed par byed pa ni gzung ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: The condition is not the cause of the object, because it is not the cause of the object.

original: 'o na ci zhe na snang ba nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /üîΩgzung ba'i mtshan nyid la ste yul la sogs pa bskal pa ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na snang ba nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la / gzung ba'i mtshan nyid la ste yul la sogs pa bskal pa ma yin pa las so //
translated: If it is not the cause of the object, how can it be the condition of the object?üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.

original: skyed par byed pa'i gzung ba'i mtshan nyid ci zhig yod ces bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //üîΩ'di'i ni gzugs la sogs pa'i'o //üîΩde dngos ni snang ba'i'o //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i gzung ba'i mtshan nyid ci zhig yod ces bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o // 'di'i ni gzugs la sogs pa'i'o // de dngos ni snang ba'i'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.

original: nges pa ni 'di snang gi 'di mi snang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa ni 'di snang gi 'di mi snang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means that the condition is only that which is helpful, not that which is not helpful, because it is not to be grasped.üîΩThe word

original: bskal pa dang cig shos dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad du thams cad snang bar 'gyur gyi tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i rgyu'i chos nyid dngos su yod na brgyud pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: bskal pa dang cig shos dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad du thams cad snang bar 'gyur gyi tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i rgyu'i chos nyid dngos su yod na brgyud pa mi rigs te /
translated: Because there is no difference between the eon and the other, everything would appear everywhere. If the nature of the cause were actually dependent on one collection, the indirect would not be tenable.

original: gzhan du blo la gzugs la sogs pa phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du blo la gzugs la sogs pa phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, form and so on would not assist the mind.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: That is the characteristic of the object of apprehension.

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i nges pa la'o //
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i nges pa la'o //
translated: In that way is the certainty of appearance.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o//
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o//
translated: That also is not different.

original: de ni dngos su skyed par byed pa'am snang ba 'am tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa yang blo'i yin par bstan pa ni 'dzin pa zhes bya ba bskyed bya'i ste 'dzin par byed pa'i'o //
analyzed: de ni dngos su skyed par byed pa'am snang ba 'am tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa yang blo'i yin par bstan pa ni 'dzin pa zhes bya ba bskyed bya'i ste 'dzin par byed pa'i'o //
translated: That is the direct producer, the appearance, the different, or the nondifferent. The teaching that the mind is the object of apprehension is the production of the object of apprehension.

original: de'i yang nye bar len pa yod pa dang / myong ba yang 'dzin pa'i sems kyi gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du gzung ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas skabs kyi nye bar bsdu ba ni sems kyi zhes bya ba nas rnam par dbye ba'i zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de'i yang nye bar len pa yod pa dang / myong ba yang 'dzin pa'i sems kyi gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du gzung ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas skabs kyi nye bar bsdu ba ni sems kyi zhes bya ba nas rnam par dbye ba'i zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: And that also has appropriation, and experience is the characteristic of the object that is grasped, like the form, etc. that are grasped by the mind that apprehends them. This is the summary of the passage from ‚Äúthe mind‚Äù up to ‚Äúdistinction.‚Äù

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi tshig blo la yang de yod pas khyad par med pa'i phyir bsam par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi tshig blo la yang de yod pas khyad par med pa'i phyir bsam par bya ba yin no //
translated: Since the words that distinguish form, etc. also exist for the mind, it is to be considered because there is no distinction.

original: gzhan du skyed par byed pa tsam la nye bar len pa med pas dngos su skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan du skyed par byed pa tsam la nye bar len pa med pas dngos su skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: Otherwise, since there is no appropriation in mere production, it is not directly productive. This is the position of the Jaina.

original: gzhan gyi sems dang dbang po yang brgyud pas rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi dngos su gzung bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems dang dbang po yang brgyud pas rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi dngos su gzung bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The mind and faculties of another are to be inferred through a series, but they are not directly apprehended.

original: gzugs sogs gzhan du min par ni //
analyzed: gzugs sogs gzhan du min par ni //
translated: Form, etc. are not like that.

original: blo la dngos su phan 'dogs med //
analyzed: blo la dngos su phan 'dogs med //
translated: The mind is not directly helpful to them.

original: ces gsungs pas gzugs la sogs @219b pa gzung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: ces gsungs pas gzugs la sogs @219b pa gzung ba nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, form and so on are the apprehended object.

original: gzung ba ma yin pa nyid ni dngos su skyed par byed pa ma yin te gzung ba nyid ni snang bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba ma yin pa nyid ni dngos su skyed par byed pa ma yin te gzung ba nyid ni snang bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is not the non-apprehended object that is the direct producer, for the apprehended object is what appears.

original: gzung ba nyid las dran pa ni ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: gzung ba nyid las dran pa ni ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Memory is not of the apprehended object itself, but of what is similar to it.

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te blo ni don gyis go bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te blo ni don gyis go bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that it is not inference, then it is as stated in the verse:üîΩIf memory of experience occurs even without inference, then direct perception that produces the experience is the cognizer.üîΩ To this, it is said:

original: rjes su dpag pa ma byung na yang nyams su myong ba dran pa yin na nyams su myong bar byed pa'i mngon sum rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba la gang tshe zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ma byung na yang nyams su myong ba dran pa yin na nyams su myong bar byed pa'i mngon sum rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba la gang tshe zhes bya ba ste /
translated: When there is no direct perception, there is no experience.üîΩWhen there is no experience, there is no memory of it.üîΩWhen there is no memory, there is no inference.üîΩWhen there is no inference, there is no conceptual thought.

original: ka ba dang bum pa la sogs pa'i spros pa ste /
analyzed: ka ba dang bum pa la sogs pa'i spros pa ste /
translated: When there is no conceptual thought, there is no proliferation of pillars, pots, and so on.

original: rgyas pa rab tu ste shin tu mang ba nyid du bgrang bar bya ba mang po nyid gang yin pa de la'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa rab tu ste shin tu mang ba nyid du bgrang bar bya ba mang po nyid gang yin pa de la'o //
translated: It is said that proliferation means extensive, that is, very numerous enumerations.

original: rings pa dang bcas par zhes bya bas bar du rjes su dpag pa'i skabs med pa'o //
analyzed: rings pa dang bcas par zhes bya bas bar du rjes su dpag pa'i skabs med pa'o //
translated: The phrase with haste means that there is no opportunity for an inference to occur in the interim.

original: don rig pa'i blo rjes su dpag pa la rang dang gzhan gyi dbye ba med par bstan pa ni don rtogs las kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don rig pa'i blo rjes su dpag pa la rang dang gzhan gyi dbye ba med par bstan pa ni don rtogs las kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase from the awareness of the object indicates that there is no distinction between self-awareness and other-awareness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyi ga'i skyon yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyi ga'i skyon yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase for this very reason means that the error applies to both positions.

original: rang rig las zhes bya ba ni gzhan rigs pa ma yin pa las te rang rig yin par gnas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig las zhes bya ba ni gzhan rigs pa ma yin pa las te rang rig yin par gnas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase from self-awareness means that it is not reasonable to posit other-awareness, since self-awareness is established.

original: phan tshun bsten pa ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun bsten pa ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa'o //
translated: The phrase mutually dependent means that the reason is not established.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni don gcig ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni don gcig ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase for this very reason means that the object is not established.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas rig pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas rig pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase therefore means that it is not reasonable to posit awareness through inference.

original: 'dzin pa'i ni nyer len dang zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i ni nyer len dang zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase the grasping of the object is stated from the perspective of the appropriating cause.

original: dngos su skyed pa dang snang ba'i gzung ba nyid ni gzhan gyi sems dang dbang po la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa yin pa bzhin du 'u bu cag la sogs pa lta bur rnal 'byor pa'i yang ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: dngos su skyed pa dang snang ba'i gzung ba nyid ni gzhan gyi sems dang dbang po la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa yin pa bzhin du 'u bu cag la sogs pa lta bur rnal 'byor pa'i yang ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
translated: But is it not the case that the yogi does not have the direct perception of the form and so on that is actually generated and the object that appears, just as we do not have the inference of the mind of another, the sense faculty and so on?

original: gzugs stsogs dang ni sems de ltar //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs stsogs dang ni sems de ltar // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Form and mind are like that.

original: bsam mi khyab ces bya ba ni gzhan gyi sems la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa gang yang rung ba'i khyad par las dngos kho nas skyed par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: bsam mi khyab ces bya ba ni gzhan gyi sems la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa gang yang rung ba'i khyad par las dngos kho nas skyed par byed pa yin te /
translated: The inconceivable is the actual generation of any special yogic consciousness, such as the mind of another, and so on.

original: des na / bdag gi mngon sum bzhin pa yang //üîΩyid bzhin pa la dmigs pa ni //
analyzed: des na / bdag gi mngon sum bzhin pa yang // yid bzhin pa la dmigs pa ni //
translated: The yogi is like me in direct perception.

original: mngon sum nyid du mi 'dod de //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid du mi 'dod de //
translated: The object of the mind is not asserted to be direct perception.

original: chos ni rnal 'byor mngon sum phyir //
analyzed: chos ni rnal 'byor mngon sum phyir //
translated: Because the dharma is the direct perception of the yogi.

original: zhes bya bas bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas bsal ba yin no //
translated: This is the refutation.

original: dub pa la sogs pas 'pho ba'i tshe na skyed par byed pa nyid yin gyi gzung ba nyid ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: dub pa la sogs pas 'pho ba'i tshe na skyed par byed pa nyid yin gyi gzung ba nyid ma yin pa'am /
translated: When the yogi is generating the form and so on through the power of the mind, it is generated by the mind, but it is not the object of the mind.

original: dang po byas pa'i gzugs las ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang po byas pa'i gzugs las ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not from the form that was previously produced.

original: gzung ba ni gzugs la sogs @220a * //
analyzed: gzung ba ni gzugs la sogs @220a * //
translated: The object is form, etc.

original: pa'o // sngar zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid yod pa ni 'gro ba'i tshe'i rtsa'i reg pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o // sngar zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid yod pa ni 'gro ba'i tshe'i rtsa'i reg pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'o //
translated: Previously means that the existence of the object is not compatible with the contact of the nerves at the time of going.

original: 'pho ba na yang rang gi blo nyid 'dzin na skyon ci zhig yod ces zer ba la de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'pho ba na yang rang gi blo nyid 'dzin na skyon ci zhig yod ces zer ba la de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When it is transferred, if one‚Äôs own mind is grasped, what is the fault?

original: de ma thag pa ni dngos su'o //
analyzed: de ma thag pa ni dngos su'o //
translated: The immediate is the direct.

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni don nyid gzung bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni don nyid gzung bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Otherwise means that the object itself would not be grasped.

original: skye ba dang 'dzin pa yang zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu tha dad pas rgyu'i nus pa yang tha dad pa ma yin nam dub pa la sogs pas gcig zhig na yang skyed pa'i nus pa yod pa kho nar bstan pa ni nus pa du ma zhes bya ba'o
analyzed: skye ba dang 'dzin pa yang zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu tha dad pas rgyu'i nus pa yang tha dad pa ma yin nam dub pa la sogs pas gcig zhig na yang skyed pa'i nus pa yod pa kho nar bstan pa ni nus pa du ma zhes bya ba'o
translated: Is the power of the cause also not different because of the difference of the effect, such as production and grasping? It is taught that even when one is tired, etc., and one ceases, the power of production exists. The power is not multiple.

original: // dngos po'i ngo bo'i nus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pas 'dzin pa ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyi yul ma yin pas rgyu nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: // dngos po'i ngo bo'i nus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pas 'dzin pa ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyi yul ma yin pas rgyu nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The apprehension of the potency of the entity‚Äôs nature, etc., is not a transcendent object, because it is not realized as a cause.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ni rang bzhin nyid kyis te rang bzhin nyid skyed par byed pa yin na thams cad kyi tshe cis mi nus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ni rang bzhin nyid kyis te rang bzhin nyid skyed par byed pa yin na thams cad kyi tshe cis mi nus pa yin zhe na /
translated: By nature means by its very nature. If the nature itself is the producer, why is it not able to produce at all times?

original: ngo bo'i khyad par ni nus pa bzhin du res 'ga' yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo'i khyad par ni nus pa bzhin du res 'ga' yin te /
translated: The difference in nature is like the potency, sometimes.

original: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni 'dra ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir yul gcig nyid yin na nus pa yang dngos po'am rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni 'dra ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir yul gcig nyid yin na nus pa yang dngos po'am rgyu ma yin te /
translated: If the object is the same, the recognition of what was seen before is not the subject of similarity. The potency is not the entity or cause,

original: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there is no concomitance, etc.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo gcig las 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ma yin te rim gyis sam cig car nyid mi rigs so snyam du sems pa la ma yin 'ga' zhig ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo gcig las 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ma yin te rim gyis sam cig car nyid mi rigs so snyam du sems pa la ma yin 'ga' zhig ces bya ba smos te /
translated: It is not that a variety of effects do not arise from a single entity‚Äôs nature, because it is not logical that they arise sequentially or simultaneously.

original: gcig ni skyed par byed pa ma yin te rim dang cig car nyid du 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig ni skyed par byed pa ma yin te rim dang cig car nyid du 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: One is not a producer, because it is contradictory for it to be sequential and simultaneous.

original: byed pa gzhan gyis kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: byed pa gzhan gyis kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it by another agent,

original: byed pa gzhan dang 'brel pas thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa gzhan dang 'brel pas thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it were related to another agent, there would be an infinite regress.

original: ma yin zhes bya bas mtshams bcad nas phyogs snga ma bkag pa yin no //üîΩ'di bstan pa ni tshogs pa yod na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes bya bas mtshams bcad nas phyogs snga ma bkag pa yin no // 'di bstan pa ni tshogs pa yod na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is not‚Äù refutes the opponent‚Äôs position.üîΩThe explanation of the existence of the collection is ‚Äúif the collection exists.‚ÄùüîΩThe explanation of the existence of the collection is ‚Äúif the collection exists.‚ÄùüîΩThe explanation of the existence of the collection is ‚Äúif the collection exists.‚Äù

translated: The explanation of the existence of the collection is ‚Äúif the collection exists.‚ÄùüîΩThe explanation of the

original: gal te gcig las kyang lhan cig byed pa'i tshogs par 'gyur ba tha dad pa las 'bras bu sna tshogs pa yin pa de lta na shes pa las kyang shes pa don dang bdag nyid la 'pho ba na gnyi @220b ga 'dzin par byed par gyur zhes zer
analyzed: gal te gcig las kyang lhan cig byed pa'i tshogs par 'gyur ba tha dad pa las 'bras bu sna tshogs pa yin pa de lta na shes pa las kyang shes pa don dang bdag nyid la 'pho ba na gnyi @220b ga 'dzin par byed par gyur zhes zer
translated: If the various effects arise from the collection of the co-operating causes, even from one, then when consciousness is transferred to the object and to itself, both would be apprehended.

original: ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the hypothetical statement.

original: gzhan ni 'pho ba'i dus na 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi phyogs rjes su brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'pho ba'i dus na 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi phyogs rjes su brjod pa'o //
translated: The other says that it arises at the time of transfer. This is the statement of the opponent's position.

original: snga phyir zhes bya ba ni sun dbyung ba ste shes pa snga ma don du snang ba yin pa'i phyir der snang ba dang / don du snang ba dang 'pho pa'i don du snang ba yang dpyod pa la sogs pa'i sems pa gcig ces bya ba ni rtog pa dang rtog ba med pa'i gnas skabs dag la'o //
analyzed: snga phyir zhes bya ba ni sun dbyung ba ste shes pa snga ma don du snang ba yin pa'i phyir der snang ba dang / don du snang ba dang 'pho pa'i don du snang ba yang dpyod pa la sogs pa'i sems pa gcig ces bya ba ni rtog pa dang rtog ba med pa'i gnas skabs dag la'o //
translated: The refutation is that the earlier and later are not simultaneous. The earlier consciousness appears as the object, so it appears as that. The appearance as the object and the appearance as the transfer of the object are the same thought, such as the thought of analysis, etc. This refers to the states with and without conception.

original: de la cir 'gyur zhe na brjod gnyis zhes bya ba ste shes pa dang brjod pa'i ngo bo tha snyad gnyis rim gyis mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de la cir 'gyur zhe na brjod gnyis zhes bya ba ste shes pa dang brjod pa'i ngo bo tha snyad gnyis rim gyis mthong ba'o //
translated: What happens? The two expressions are seen in sequence, the two conventions, the nature of cognition and expression.

original: rim min te cig car nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: rim min te cig car nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Not in sequence, but experienced simultaneously.üîΩThe retention of the letter i is the retention of the letter, and when it appears, the previous cognition appears.

original: 'bras bus rgyu mtshon pa las yi ge ai 'dzin pa ni yi ge 'dzin pa yin la de snang ba na shes pa snga ma snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: 'bras bus rgyu mtshon pa las yi ge ai 'dzin pa ni yi ge 'dzin pa yin la de snang ba na shes pa snga ma snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: Even prior to the transference to another object, the cognition of the object is the appearance of the object and the cognition of that cognition.üîΩThe two pairs are the cognition of the object and the cognition of that cognition.üîΩThe previous cognition is the cognition of the object and the cognition of that cognition.üîΩThe cognition of the object is the cognition of the object and the cognition of that cognition.üîΩThe cognition of the object is the cognition of the object and the cognition of that cognition.

original: yul gzhan la 'pho ba'i snga rol yang yul gyi shes pa yul du snang ba dang de'i shes pa'i shes par yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni gnyis gnyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yul gzhan la 'pho ba'i snga rol yang yul gyi shes pa yul du snang ba dang de'i shes pa'i shes par yang 'gyur bar bstan pa ni gnyis gnyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The cognition of the object is the cognition of the object and the cognition of that cognition.

original: bdag nyid kyang don gyis dang de'i rig pa dang don gyi rig pa'o //üîΩsngar gyi blo yang yin la gzugs la sogs pa'i don yang 'dzin pa de dag gi 'dzin pa yin no //
